Yes, I had kind of an eerie and generally unsettling feeling. I wondered why I did that in the first place. Can you relate?	I think I can, it's like that feeling you get when you're not sure what to do next.

In NFL it's the Packers and college is Alabama	I love the Packers! I don't know much about Alabama.
I visited the BMX park today and saw someone doing a double front flip with their bike, it was insane!	That is awesome!  I've never seen anyone do that before!

I agree, years of experience and a lot of guts are needed. You could easily get injured but he pulled it off. It was crazy to see it in person. It's the type of stuff you see on TV	That's so true, I see a lot of bad stuff on the news. But I'm glad you got to see it.

My car broke down yesterday but luckily my friend was able to pick me up from work while it was in the shop. I think I'm going to take him to a nice restaurant to say thanks.	That's nice of your friend!

I ended up getting an A actually. It was exactly what I wanted to get.	That's awesome! What was it about?
My friend passed away in a car crash a couple days ago, I'm still in shock.	I am so sorry to hear that.  I am sure you are feeling pretty down.  I am sorry about that.
They've been really closed up about the whole thing, I can't contact them or anything. They must be going through a tough time, I could not imagine.	I'm sorry to hear that.  I hope they are okay.
I realized yesterday I was pregnant, I was in shock!	That is very exciting! Do you have any plans for the baby?
I am still in awe, I think things will turn out fine but it was definitely not expected.	I am sure they will. I had a similar experience.
When the weather was getting bad and it rained hard in our area, I was ready for the flooding that was going to happen in our neighborhood.	That is scary! I hope you were prepared.

I had an emergency generator, extra food and first aid kits at the ready. I did not want my family in danger.	That's great.  I've always been a little nervous about emergencies.  Did you have any kids?

I was 17, at that age I should of known better.	I agree, you should have known better.

Aw thank you. He seems to be recovering pretty well, just whiny.	Oh nice. He sounds like a little scally wabbit.
I managed to get on the A honor roll at my school, I was a bit smug and happy for myself about the whole thing.	That's great!  Did you have to work hard for it?
I'm just happy that I got it, it took a lot of hard work.	That's good to hear! What did you get?
The last time I hung out with a group of friends before moving we watched this really terrible movie.	Oh man that sounds like a terrible movie.
Yeah, it was fun.  We ended up making the best of it, making fun of the movie while it was on.	That's really funny. I hate when movies are on too long.
I remember sitting in the waiting room before my last job interview.  I was sweating and couldn't stop my leg from shaking.	I bet you felt pretty nervous!
The interview went well and I ended up getting the job, so I guess I worried for nothing :)	That is great news!  I am so happy for you.

The other day I had to take my dogs out before work, but my neighbor was right outside with her aggressive yappy dog smoking so I couldn't get out.	Oh no!  Did you ever get to see what kind of dog it was?
She usually cares enough to at least time her cigarettes so they don't get in the way with things like work, but not this time.	That's terrible.  Is she sick?

I was at a pizza joint and my chair leg broke and I fell to the floor. Everyone in the pizza place all was looking at me on the floor. My face was so red and the manager came over and helped me up.	That's terrible. I'm sorry you had to go through that.
Now I can laugh, but when I was on the floor I was not laughing, I just wanted to leave.	Oh, that's sad. Did you get a good laugh?
My son is 16 months and he finally learned how to use a spoon and a fork. I've been trying to teach him for a couple of months!	Oh wow! That is so exciting.  I am sure you are so proud of him!
He is still very messy but he really enjoys eating like a big boy	That is so sweet! What kind of food does he like?
When my wife and I started dating, our second date ended up lasting like 12 hours.	That's a long date. I'm glad you guys had a good time though.
Lunch, a zoo, my apartment for a while, and a movie and dinner.  We just didn't want to go home for the night :P	Oh, that's nice, I love zoos.  What were you and your friends doing?

Years ago my childhood beagle died from kidney failure.  I found him in the kitchen in the morning, he did not go easily :(	That must have been so sad.  I'm so sorry.  I know how much you loved your pet.
Yeah, he had diabetes for a few years by that point.  It was just a rough way to go and I hope it didn't take very long.	I'm sorry to hear that, but I'm glad you're being positive.

I remember getting my first job and just working so hard for that first week cause it was retail	Oh I know that feeling! I did the same thing with my first job.  I worked for 2 weeks before I got my first job.
Oh man the thing that got me was waiting for the first check to come in though. Remember that? You're very FIRST one	It was such a long time ago.
I realized that my bus that I ride to work in every day is a revamped school bus	Oh, that is pretty cool.  How long have you been riding it?
Oh god no thankfully I have fond memories of it. I just realized how cheap the company is!	I bet it was.  Did you go to work?

Yeah we where together for about 2 years but im getting over it now	That's a bummer.  How did it end?

Yeah, it certainly lead to a lot of good natured ribbing from my parents :P	Oh that's nice. Did you guys have fun?

We are getting our son to go back to college in a few days and it really made me stop and think back to him when he was smaller, and how time flies by so fast!	That's so true, time just goes by so fast.
I know, that's about how I felt too! I think back to when he was much smaller and how adorable he was when he would call me mommy then!	That's so sweet! I bet you have some great memories of him.
The last time I went to the fair, I tripped and fell. There were so many people around that saw me hit the ground. You can imagine how I felt!	I'm sorry to hear that.

I scuffed my knees a bit, but I was okay. I was also with a person that I really liked, so that made it even worse. But, I jumped up super quick lol	Oh no!  Well you are lucky to have such a nice friend.  I bet you felt a little bad though, but it's good you had a friend to hang out with.
i stold some spare change from my parents	That's the worst thing you can do
maybe like 19, but i felt bad after so i invited them to dinner	That's nice. What did you do?

Yeah i told them as well	My sister passed away several years ago. I really had a hard time with the grief and couldn't really relate to anyone that tried to help me with it.	I'm sorry for your loss. I know how that feels.

Yes, I'm sure you can relate as well. Ironically, that was the same age that my sister passed away. She took her own life, which my mother and I found her, and it was very hard for us all. But, I couldn't burden my parents with my pain, I felt.	I'm so sorry to hear about your sister. I hope she is in a better place.
Having a good job is something to thank	That's good to hear. What job do you have?
to life God to that higher energy	I agree with you.  I was in a bad place a few years ago, but I felt a sense of hope and peace when I was in that place.
Nobody ... that's why I'm grateful	Did you do something good?
I'm an administrative assistant for a construction company	That sounds like a very interesting job.

actually in 2 weeks! I'm so excited about it. I'm going there with my son! They've never met him	Oh wow! That is awesome! I'm sure you'll have a blast!
I was annoyed when my favorite show wasn't on	I hate that. What show was it?
I ended up watching Impractical Jokers	That was a funny show. I love it.
I love when I need to show someone how to do something and everything goes off without a hitch.	That is the best feeling.

I tend to know a thing or two on occasion.	I am taking a long overdue and much needed vacation this week. I wish i didnt have to fly.	I'm glad you're taking some time to relax and recharge. I'm sure you'll have a great trip!

you are right. Guess I know better for next time.	My sunday was great. All my chores were done ahead of time. It was a rare and welcomed day.	I am so glad to hear that. What chores did you do?
I wish I could more often, but it rarely happens. Especially during the summer. My yard grows like literal weeds.	I am sorry to hear that. It's hard to see your yard get overgrown.
ouch! I would not have had a relaxing sunday if my yard was that way.	I bet, what happened?

My husband has to travel a lot for work. It can be hard on a marriage, but after almost 23 years of marriage, I have faith he is loyal and faithful when he does.	That's great to hear! It can be hard for people to be away from each other, but if you have a strong relationship, it can be really good.
He is an iron worker, so he has to go state to state at times to build very large buildings.	i am sure you are proud of him

He said he was only being nice, but I felt he was being a bit 'too nice', which made me feel a bit upset.	That's weird.  I'm sorry that happened to you.  But honestly, it's not your fault.  You can't control what others do.  It's your husband's responsibility to be respectful of you.

Well, we really didn't know her very well and she actually just came to one of our friends house while we were there, and she was intoxicated. He was trying to help her get up and situated, but he was very insistent about it, even when she didn't want help. It looked bad to others.	Oh, that sounds so scary. Did you have to call the police?
My niece is super talented lately.	That's awesome. Is she a musician?
Art, she was accepted into a special program for high school.	Did she get an A?

Mostly drawing. And she's in advanced level classes in most subjects.	One day my 10 year old daughter came home crying after she got off the bus. A teenage boy purposely tripped her as she was getting off and she got hurt. Needless to say, I was very, very upset!	I'm sorry to hear that. That must have been really scary for you.

I actually knew his father, so I called and spoke to him about it. I let him know that if it happened again, I couldn't promise her big brother wouldn't take it in his own hands to defend her, as he wasn't okay with anyone bullying her.	That is very mature of you, I am sure your friend appreciated it
I really dont like my husbands job right now.	That's terrible. Have you talked to him about it?
Retail, but he's working nights at a store really far away and it sucks	I know how you feel.  I've worked nights and it's hard.

We are hoping with in a few months.	Each year my husband usually gets a bonus this month or next. It's not promised, but it has happened for several years now. I am really wishing it will be this year too!	What a great feeling!

Well, we have college tuition, just got back from an expensive beach vacation, etc. So, if anything replenish some savings, right!	Oh yeah, I know what you mean.  I'm trying to save up for a car, and a vacation, and a house.  It's a lot to keep track of.
I hate watching movies that are full of gore! I just saw one today and so gross!	I know what you mean.  I try to avoid them as much as possible.  I'd rather watch a nice romantic comedy.
Yes, I was just flipping through the channels and happened upon a man cutting his own leg off. yuck!	I hate that show!
My husband usually gets a substantial bonus this time of the year, but there's no guarantee. It's difficult waiting, and not knowing!	That is frustrating. I hope you will get it!

My husband usually gets a substantial bonus this time of the year, but there's no guarantee. It's difficult waiting, and not knowing!	That's a good thing though, it's always good to have a little uncertainty in life.

He is a welder and iron worker, so he works very hard all year long and does extensive amounts of travel. He has earned it!	I've been married a long time, but my husband is gone quite a bit for work. I feel a bit by myself at times because of this :(	I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're okay.
Luckily, my children still live at home, but it's not quite the same. Plus, it won't be too long before they are ready to move out	I'm sure they will be ready soon. What are they in school for?

My youngest child started high school this year. It really made me think back to her starting kindergarten, and how time really goes by. I can just see her learning to read!	That's awesome! I hope she does well!
Yes, it really is bittersweet. But, the older they get, the easier it is to think back to the younger days!	I totally understand. I'm 30 and I have so many good memories from when I was younger.
I was so scared when i heard a gunshot sound while i was walking through the streets the other day	I'm so sorry. Did you call the police?
No, i felt it would be better if i dont go looking for it. i managed to get the hell out of there	That is good. I hope you are safe.
I feel so sad whenever thoughts about my dad come to me, he passed away last year	I'm so sorry to hear that.  I hope you can find some closure.
He had terminal stage brain cancer.. we did all we could, but..	How did it end?
i felt really good about myself when i got a new job at a reputed firm	That's awesome. What kind of job was it?
i was so angry when i found out my girlfriend kissed a friend of mine	That's awful.  Was it a new friend or someone you know?
i have not confronted them. still thinking about it	I'm sorry to hear that. What happened?
I went to the beach last week	That sounds like fun! Did you enjoy it?
yeah. so much memories of me and family spending time in beach came to me	Did you go to the beach recently?
I was so furious when i found out a coworker badmouthed me to my boss	That's terrible.  How did you react?
Yeah. i outperform this person, and he started throwing shade on me out of pure jealousy	That's not cool.  What did he say?

It was such a stunning show. Lin manuel should get a grammy for this	I love that guy! He's amazing!

Yeah, i felt like i was coming down with something. i rushed to get a cab, but i couldn't help it	I feel you. I was in the middle of a conversation with my girlfriend and I had to take a cab. I think I was getting a bit sick.
My girlfriend asked me to meet her parents next week	Oh no!  Are you nervous?
I am not sure to be honest. i am feeling so nervous about it	I am not sure what you are talking about.
i felt betrayed when my girlfriend kissed another guy at a party	That's awful.  What did you do?
Nothing. She was drunk, so i let it go. I still feel disappointed	That is pretty hard to hear.

She lives in another state and wasn't due for several more months. Everyone is fine now though, so it has turned out to be very joyous.	I am glad that the situation turned out well for everyone.
I was in total shock the night my fiance proposed to me at a concert.	I have never been to a concert before. How did it go?

They started playing one of our special songs and the next think I knew he was down on one knee. I said yes, of course!	Oh my goodness, that's so sweet!  That's the kind of moment you'll always remember.  What did you name the baby?
I admire my boss because he does not act like a boss. He acts more like a friend and he is so down to earth.	That is very nice of him. I hope you are happy with him.
He is not just friendly, he is a good leader and knows how to treat his workers.	That is so nice.  I wish I had a good leader like that.  I am so tired of the way people treat their employees.
I remember when I was a kid and in the summertime I used to catch fireflies and place them in a jar by my bedside at night.	That sounds like a fun time.  I used to do the same thing with glow sticks.
The fireflies would blink in the jar all night long.	That's a nice way to spend the evening.

I'm so tired this morning, I went to bed early, but it seems when I go to bed early I wake up more tired. It aggravates me!	I know the feeling.  I go to bed super early and wake up super early.  It's like my body is trying to tell me that it's time to get up.
I hate it! I feel more energized when I get 4 hours of sleep than I do when I get 8!	I know that feeling. I always feel more alert after 4 hours.
I'm in contract to buy my first house, fingers crossed closing goes well and I close next Friday!	Oh that is exciting.  What are you looking to buy?

She doesn't understand why I always have so many other things to do, but she would literally play 24/7 if I had the time.	Oh, that's so unfair. What's your problem?
My four year old daughter came to me beaming with pride and showing me a drawing she did of me.	That is so sweet!  Is she a good artist?
I was really surpised.  I expected a stick figure, but she drew a lot of features including my beard and mustache.	Did you like it?
I had to run some errands.  While gone I instructed my older daughters to complete some math assignments.	That's nice of you.  Did they do well?
When I returned I found them playing video games, the math work was not even attempted.  I tunred their stuff off and we did it together.	Oh wow! That must have been fun!
A recruiter contacted me the other day about potential job openings, so I'm hoping I may have a job soon!	Oh that's great, good luck!
Me too. I've been dying to get out of my current job, but having a recruiter makes me feel at ease.	That's good. I don't know what I would do if I had to leave my current job.
I found a box of old photos in my closet yesterday.	That sounds exciting. What kind of photos?
A lot of them where photos of my sister and I when we were toddlers.  It was a good trip down memory lane.	That is really nice.  I love looking at old photos.  Do you have any of those photos?
I was disgusted when my dad left me	What did he do?
I'm not sure. I guess he just didn't want anything to do with me.	That's not good, what did he do?
I have been rehearsing for a job interview for a couple of weeks now, and I am so ready!	I bet you are! I hope you do well.
I don't normally prepare for interviews, but I really want this job, so I put in a lot of practice.	What kind of job is it?
I went to the fride and was surprised to find what I thought was an ice cream cake.	I think you might have been mistaken.
It turned out to not even be an ice cream cake.  It was some kind of pinapple cake.  I still had a piece but it was disappointing.	That's okay, it happens
I was surprised when my wife left me	You must have been very upset.
We were married for 10 years	Why did you get married?
I was annoyed when my family missed my birthday	I'm sorry, I hope you're okay.
Yeah that's very true. Doesn't mean we aren't important though	I agree with you there. We are important to who we are with.
Interestingly, I also had a job interview recently, although I've already heard back and I got it!	What kind of job were you interviewing for?
A lab manager for a Physics department at a University.	Oh, that's interesting. Is he or she doing a good job?
I had a terrifying experience what using the restroom yesterday.	Oh no!  What happened?

As I was sitting on the toilet I kept hearing a scratching noise.  When I turned to look a huge waterbug had climbed up the tub wall next to me.	Oh my goodness, that's so gross! I wouldn't have been able to look at myself if it had been that close. Did you have to call a plumber?
When I was younger, my dad got into a motor cycle accident. It made me not want to learn how to drive for almost 2 years.	Oh no! Did it get worse?
I did learn, but it took a long time to overcome my fear. I'm glad I eventually did!	I bet it was a scary experience! I'm glad you overcame it!
I had to replace my toilet the other day.  It was a new experience, and not altogether pleasant.	That's a bummer. Did you find it easy to replace?
Yeah.  It wasn't terribly hard, but it definitely took watching a few videos to feel confident.	That is true. You would have to be very good at it to feel confident.

I was grateful when I married my wife	What made you marry her?
We met at a store	oh no that is not good.

Well, ranted about it to my girlfriend for a while then talked to the professor to make it clear what she did.	That's good.  I'm sure she'll understand.
My family and I are close to aquiring a new home.	That's great! I hope everything goes smoothly!

It was a mustang. I saved up enough money and purchased it outright	That's awesome! I love mustang cars.
I was fast asleep this morning when my cat pounced on me and jolted me awake.	Oh no! That's terrible! Did you get hurt?
It came out of nowhere. I almost fell out of bed!	Oh no! What happened?

Yeah, we would take a bottle of wine with us, watch the surfers and just kick back. Wish those days would return.	I'm sorry to hear that. I think the best thing you can do is try to stay positive.

I have. I've studied for 3 week now	Well, you must be feeling confident.
I've been trying lately to potty train my youngest daughter.	That's a great goal. I hope she does well.
It's been a challenge.  Yesterday she got on the toilet herself though.  She said she didn't want to be a baby anymore.	That's awesome!

Yeah, we talk by text all the time and call every day.  It's still hard though, we haven't been apart longer than a couple days since we met.	That sounds like a lot of time. I bet you miss him a lot.
I was sad when my dog died	That is so sad.  Did you have a big dog?
Its ok. It's just been rough without him. I miss him	Oh, I am sorry to hear that.
My wife is coming home after being out of the country for 2 months.  I can't wait!	That is great!  I bet you are going to make it a great time.
I am!  We've never been apart this long, so it's been tough.	I bet.  I am sure you will be together again soon.  How long have you been apart?
I was afraid when I watched a horror film	Oh no, what movie?

Germany for a language course.	Oh, that sounds nice. Did you have a good experience?

Do you have something you are looking forward to?	My father passed away about 2 1/2 years ago. It was totally unexpected and really was very traumatic and hurtful to me. He was still quite young and my family and I had no idea he had a life threatening health issue.	I am so sorry for your loss.

I was pretty close to my father and always lived close by. But, you always wish you had more time. But, the last words I said to him was that I loved him, and I'm grateful for that.	Yeah, that is a great way to go out.  I have been in a similar situation.  It is hard to understand when you have been close to someone.  I hope you are doing well.

it's never going to be ok, but it will be a little less painful in time.	Why is it hard?

My family and all kinds of old memories, birthdays, festivals, swimming, and other stuff	That's really cool.  Do you have any special family traditions?

no, it just started happening. I would say it started a couple of months ago. i will see a doctor in 2 weeks	That's a good thing. I hope everything is okay.

Thank you. I don't think it matters how old you are when a parent passes away, it's very painful. The vacation did bring back great memories with him though.	I am sure it was very sad.  How old was your dad?

i did, the lady told me they can't do anything about it because it didn't have a tracking number.	That is really frustrating. It's like they just don't want to help.

Well, it wasn't one of his toys like I thought. It was a dead mouse	Oh no. That's bad. I hope he was not too upset.

I know! they  grow up so fast! I feel like i just gave a birth to him and look at him now	That is true, time really does fly!

It might be, but considering I'm 29 with an artificial hip as well, I've gotten used to being half metal.	Last semester was probably the largest challenge of my life. I go to school for electrical engineering, and I took 6 courses.	That's a lot of work. I hope you made it through okay.
Oh my gosh then you know! I have to say though, it all came out in the wash - 4 As and 2 Bs!	Oh no!  I bet you are so embarrassed.  I am sorry.

Phew! I'm glad I am not the only one. Although for me, it happened in the middle of dinner at a small Vietnamese restaurant, and an employee walked in on me cleaning my pants in the sink!	Oh my goodness!  I would be so mortified!  Did you say anything to the employee?

going near hights really makes me scared	I know, it's crazy!
just instinc i think i have always been afraid of heights	I'm afraid of heights too! I have been to many amusement parks that have had very tall roller coasters.

well it is not really her fault it just makes me angry hahah	I'm sorry to hear that. Is it someone in your life that you are angry at?

california, i really hope i get to go to universal studios	I think I do too!  It's so much fun!

5 months ago now. It's really nice here, there are 3 swimming pools	That's great! You must be happy.

I'm not sure. Doors and windows were locked, but I was so relieved when my husband got home.	I'm a youth leader, and just the other day a teen from the group was asked to speak at a local church.	That is so cool. I think it would be very exciting to be asked to speak at a church.

Everything. I don't have friends so it's nice to get noticed	I understand. I wish I had friends like that.

It was, kind of hot but not enough to complain about.	Oh? That's nice. I hate when it gets too hot outside.
I hate how our country is so divided right now	I agree. I think we need to come together more.
True. I hope we can become less divided in the future and solve things	I agree.  We've got a lot to work out.

My father passed away about 2 years ago. It was so very difficult for me and very unexpected. We didn't know he had a life-threatening illness and weren't prepared in any way for his sudden departure from us.	I am so sorry to hear that. What did you do to honor him?

Yes, my family and I are close and we were there for each other. But, my sister had passed away around 6 years before, by committed suicide. The last few years have been very difficult.	That's terrible. I'm so sorry.
I feel like a terrible sibling right now.	What did you do?
My sister, who lives out of state and i don't see often, was recently in town visiting our dad. I didn't visit with them.	That's nice, I bet you were happy to see her.
I am going to a concert very soon.	Are you excited about it?
Imagine Dragon and Grace Vanderwhall, do you know them?	I do, they are pretty talented.

Yes she was.	Our new property management person is remarkably efficient. She emailed me details of a conversation we had yesterday. The others promise the earth and don't deliver!	Oh, that's good! I hope they do deliver.
It is. I've been trying to switch apartments for months and this is the first time someone has actually done anything about it.	That's very frustrating, I hope you get your new apartment soon!
Absolutely! I move September 1st. No more stompy screechy neighbors at 3 am!!	School for my kids started again this past Thursday.	Oh, I'm sorry. What are they in?

It was good. I am dealing with a mixture of both emotions about them being back in school. I was happy I had all the supplies, clothes, shoes, and other odds and ends in time.	Why did they go back to school?
I had planned a beach trip about a month before we actually went.	That was smart. What happened?
We went to Virginia Beach earlier this week. I was so giddy up that whole month I could barely contain myself.	That sounds like a lot of fun!
My husband, 2 kids and my mother. My kids had never been to the beach.	That's awesome. They should be very happy.
I bought a ticket last week for the lottery, when it was over 100 million dollars.	That's crazy! I bet you were so happy!
I was so excited watching the numbers being drawn, but no I didn't win. But someone did! I'm sure they were happy.	Oh well, maybe you should try to get a lottery ticket next time.
True, but it would be fun spending that money.	My husband just found out he will start getting a monthly bonus! This was unexpected and great news	That is great news.  How much is the bonus?
It sure does. It came as a shock, but a pleasant one.	Oh wow, did it happen recently?
I just went today to visit my son in his new house.	Oh wow! How did he like his new house?
It was great! He has saved for so long to buy it.	Well that is really nice of him.

So tonight we are suppose to go eat out as a family but I cant get a single one of my family members to agree on a place.  So frustrating!	That is terrible, I hate it when that happens.  You might have to go to a different place.

That's actually not a bad idea.  Wish I had come up with that earlier.  It seems everyone wants something different.	I like that idea. I can imagine how difficult it would be to have everyone having the same thing.

Im going to have to sue that for next week.  I think this week they can all go make PB&J since they want to be difficult.	Oh no, that sounds terrible. What are they doing that you want to sue them about?
I guess that way the wallet wins every once and awhile too!  lol	I'm so happy that it is Friday!	I'm glad, how can you be?
Somewhat, I work 4 10 hour shifts and have a random off day during the week. Yesterday was my off day. What about you?	I do that too. I really enjoy it because it gives me time to relax.
feels disappointed because my friend fights with me	Why does he fight with you?
no i can't because i love him a lot	Oh no!  Why can't you?
I have Lupus and it is getting worse.  I asked my doctor for a chance to try a new diet I found that is suppose to help me with it.	How has your diet been going?

yes, but they are quite powerful which I am trying to avoid.  I am already on one and I am hoping that through this diet I can get off b/c the next steps won't be fun	I am sorry to hear that. I hope you can get off the b.

Some time ago, there was a terrible tornado that came through my city. It destroyed many homes, a school and some people died. I was so fearful and petrified it would come by our home and destroy it, or harm my familY!	Oh no, that must have been so scary.  Did you have to go to a shelter?
No, they are so awful! They can destroy so much.	I'm sorry, they are so awful.
My husband took me to get a new wedding band recently	Oh that's so sweet of him!
I didn't know ahead of time! Mine had broken a bit and he saved up to get me a new one.	Did you like the new one?
I love the holidays. Driving around looking at decoration is my favorite.	I love decorating! I enjoy it a lot.
Christmas. It makes me miss my moms decor.	That is a shame.
I have a wonderful sister-in-law.  who is always there for me when I need her	What's her name?

I feel so lucky to have her as a sister-in-law and a friend.  She is always there to offer a supporting ear and encouraging word.	That's great!  I'm glad you have that.  What are you guys doing together?

A few weeks ago, we finally got a chance to get back to the beach for our vacation. But, it rained several days, so we didn't get to spend as much time at the beach as we wanted, which sucked. We were really looking forward to it.	I hate when the weather is bad, especially when it rains.

Oh, no, it was about a 7 hour drive! My daughter was quite young when we went and didn't remember the first trip and she's a teenager now. So, a long time since we first went.	Oh, that's so sad. How old is she now?
My husband just a promotion at work he was really wanting	What did he get?
I know..ha ha!  He worked so hard for this and I am so proud of him.	Aww that's so cool!  What did he do?

We took a vacation recently and had to leave my daughter's teenage boyfriend a key to our house so he could take care of the pets. He's a good young man, so we didn't feel uncomfortable anything would come up missing.	I am sure he will take good care of them.
We didn't have much choice, as we had an outdoor dog and indoor cat, so if we didn't, we'd come back to not having pets. But, I wouldn't just let anybody, that's for sure!	That's a good point.
My mother-in-law once told a secret of mine that she promised she would never tell	I'm sure she didn't. I would be shocked if she didn't.
I know it really hurt me and I had to work on trusting her again with other things	That's terrible. What did you do?
One night when my children and I came home, I saw a shadow inside! I was so fearful and afraid!	Oh my goodness. What was it?
It was so scary! Luckily, it was actually my shadow! The light made my shadow show up, but it first appeared to be an intruder!	Did you see it moving?

Last weekend, my family and I enjoyed a nice meal together, and then watched a movie. It was a relaxing time at home, just enjoying each other's company.	That sounds wonderful! I love that type of time. What movie did you watch?
Yes, it was drama free and a relaxing time.	I love relaxing times.
My dog, riley had to be put to sleep due to congestive heart failure	I'm sorry to hear that. I hope he was comfortable.
It was one of the hardest things I had to go through but I know that Riley is not suffering anymore so that helps	I'm sorry to hear that. How did he die?

I didn't tell my friend when her boyfriend hit on me. She was in a bad spot and needed him for financial support, and that's why I didn't tell her. But, I still felt so bad about it.	That's a pretty good friend you are. I would have felt the same way.

Well, she had custody of her handicapped grandchild and no job, plus she was very much in love with him. I thought it would just make things worse for her.	That sounds pretty tough. Did she end up getting a job?
I am trying a new diet to treat my Lupus.	That sounds like a challenging one. I am sure you are doing all you can.
I am nervous b/c so much rides on if this works or not.  If it doesn't than I have to take some really powerful meds that i would rather not take	Oh no! Are you taking them for something else?

There's a coworker that will not follow instructions on work assignments, so she makes many mistakes. It's so frustrating and aggravating, since it causes others more work.	I am so sorry to hear that.  Are you in the same department as her?
Exactly! You try nicely to explain it to her over and over, but she won't listen. Such a nuisance!	I'm sorry.

My mother picked my daughter up for school to take in the morning, and found her cat dead. It was so hard for my daughter and made us all very upset.	oh that is so sad, i'm sorry to hear that, how old was the cat?
Yes, she was only about 9, and loved her cat so much. It broke my heart to see her so upset!	Oh no! I'm sorry to hear that!
I decided to play the lottery the other day and won.	That's awesome! Did you buy a ticket?
Not normally, so I was quite surprised.	How did that happen?
$1000. It was enough to help me catch up on my bills. So I was happy.	That is great to hear! It sounds like you have a good financial situation.
Thank you, that was the first time I have ever won anything like that. I almost passed out.	I have a bad experience at the supermarket the other day.	Oh no! What happened?
Someone backed into my new car.	That's terrible. I hope you weren't hurt.

Yes, they ran! I was so mad when I got to the car and saw it.	Many years ago, we were at a friend's house and one of her friend's was there and she was drunk. My husband was very insistent on helping her, but I felt he was being a bit to 'helpful'. It made me a bit angry!	I'm sorry to hear that. Did you tell her she was drunk?

Well, she was attractive and at the time, I thought he was thinking that too. But, I know now he was just trying to help her get to a safe place, since she was falling down. But, it was hard to see it at that time lol	That is a good thing he was trying to help her. You are lucky to have such a kind person in your life.
I had a bad morning when I went to check my mail.	Did you find anything in the mail?
Especially when you find your mailbox laying in about 10 pieces after someone knocked it down last night.	That's awful! Did you call the police?
Not really. I live in town, but it's a small town.	Oh no, do you have a job in town?
That's a good idea. I might do that. We don't have a camera because we don't normally have any troubles.	I like that. We do have a camera, but it's a point-and-shoot. I'd like to use it more often.
My aunt came to visit today, we went out for mexican food!	Oh that sounds good, what was the food like?
Yes, kind of upset she was only able to stay in town for a few hours, she is on a road trip!	That's nice. I bet she enjoyed it.
I have a big exam for college coming up, I have been studying day and night.	What is the exam on?
It is for my molecular biology class, I feel pretty good that I am going to Ace it.	That's great! You must be very confident.
I went and saw a hockey game today, It was really exciting.	I love hockey.  Did you watch a specific team?
No, I use to play growing up. I haven't been to a game since graduating highschool.	That's too bad.
I was on a run today, and saw a loose dog but couldn't catch it before it ran off!	Oh no, that is scary!
Maybe if you live in Central Texas...haha! But I was so worried about that small dog getting hit!	Oh my goodness! I am so sorry. Was he okay?
I got some bad news today, my dad passed away.	That is terrible. I am so sorry to hear that.
Thank you, I am a mess. It is still hasn't hit me that he passed away.	I am sorry to hear that.
Its so quiet in my house, my husband is out of town for work.	What do you do when you hear the creaks?
True, I'm trying but keep hearing creepy noises. Guess I need to turn the TV up louder haha	Oh, sounds like you have some spooky noises in the house.
I got some great news today! My husband got a better paying job offer!	That is so exciting! I bet you were happy for him!
Not sure yet, but itll help us life more comforatbly! We move to his hometown in November when he gets out of Army!	That's exciting.  What is his hometown?
My daughter is in highschool but took a college course this summer and got an A!	That is awesome! I am so proud of you!
That is very good. You should be proud of her.	I ate way too many sweets today!	How many did you eat?
Thanks! Being on a diet is hard, espically with family in town!	I can imagine, but you are getting stronger every day.
I was running today and felt like this car was following me..	That's a little creepy, what kind of car is it?
Yes it was, I think I need to start carrying pepper spray or something	I am glad you are safe.
Im watching the show The Bold Type, my favourtie characters dad died :(	I've heard that show is good!  What's his name?
Yes, it's a great girly drama! Reminds me of Sex in the City but Modern.	I haven't seen that show!
It's been a great night! I'm just relaxing with a cold drink and my favourite show!	That sounds like a lot of fun!
Yes defenitly, It dosen't get better then this! My daughter has been fast asleep since 8pm.	That's great. You must be exhausted.
My family is moving from Texas to Arkansas in a few months, Im worried for the change.	Oh no, how long have you lived in Texas?
My husband is getting out of the Army and moving back to his hometown where he has a few job offers! Big changes coming..	That's great. You must be excited. I bet you are.
I recently moved into a new home.	Did you like it?
Yes, there are a lot of kids that our daughter can play with.	Oh, that's great. Do you have a lot of kids?
We had been saving for 4 years to buy a bigger house. We had outgrown our other home.	I had a doctors appointment today.	Did you have to go to the doctor?
I was so mad because I had to wait a hour after my appointment time before they called me back.	That's so annoying!  I'm sorry you had to wait so long.  Did they keep you waiting too long?

I agree! Everyone was so annoyed because we were all waiting forever.	I had just moved in to my new apartment, and every night this skinny little tabby came begging for food at my door.	Oh, that's so cute! I love cat food.
At first I tried to resist, but I ended up adopting him!	Oh my, I'm so happy for you!
I received a wrong number call last night at 2 in the morning.	Oh no, that's scary! Did you answer?
Yes! It was so aggravating. They would not believe me when I kept telling them it was the wrong number.	I would be too!
She did twice before she finally believe me that there was no Bret there.	I recently found out that I am having baby number 4.	Did you have an abortion?
Wow! That is great. We were thrilled because we didn't know if we were going to have anymore and nature just decided for us.	That's really cool. How did it happen?
Yes they are. They make life worth living.	Halloween is quite a big holiday where I live. People get really in to their costumes!	I love dressing up for Halloween! It's such a fun time of year.
It's peoples creativity that makes it so entertaining. Last year I went as a plague doctor, and everyone agreed it was terrifying!	I love that!  What did you wear?
Last year we lost our home of 20 years to a house fire.	That's terrible! I'm so sorry to hear that.
Yes, thankfully everybody was safe. Nobody was even home when it happened.	I hope that was not a fire.

No, we just bought another house closer to town. It was sad losing everything that we had.	When me and my friend got lost in the desert, I thought we were done for.	That's terrible. I bet you are glad you made it out alive.
Only a couple of hours. We flagged down an old Chevy truck and the man driving got us sorted out.	How did you get sorted out?
I went tonight to meet my daughters teacher.	That sounds fun. Did she like it?
Yes, I think she will be a great teacher. She showed us her plan for the year and I think it was great.	That's great! What is her subject?
Thanks so much. I completely agree.	I just finished watching the Saw movie.	Oh yea? I haven't seen that one. What did you think of it?
I hated it! I didn't want to watch it but my husband did. The gore is just too much!	That's not good. How long did you have to watch?
Yep! I feel kind of sick to my stomach now from watching it.	I recently went down memory lane was looked at all my high school yearbooks.	I love that! I am sure it was a fun time.
Well.... maybe not as awesome. lol But I do try to keep in shape. It was good seeing all my old friends.	That is nice. I am not really into that sort of thing. I think I will stick to my video games.
I do a lot of them but some have moved away and we just lost touch.	I understand, it can be tough when people move away from you.
That's a good idea!	I love that idea!
I had this guy flag me down today after leaving the store.	That's great. What did he say?
I was scared at first and then he hollered and pointed to the top of my car and I had left my purse on it. Boy, did my face get red.	Oh no, what did you do?
My daughter just bought her first car on her own.	Oh wow, that's so cool! I bet she is so proud.
It's a 2008 Mustang. She worked the last two summers to buy it.	That's a pretty sweet car. How long have you had her?
She is super excited to start school now and show it off.	I'm leaving tomorrow to go on vacation!	Oh wow, where are you going?
We are going to Daytona and Orlando for 10 days.	That sounds like a lot of fun!
I sure hope so! We've been planning this trip for a year.	That's great! What are you going to do?

My husband and I have a fun weekend trip planned soon. We are going to go to the casino for the weekend, just the two of us. We are really looking forward to it.	That sounds fun! I bet you will have a great time.
Yes, it's been awhile since we had just some time for us. Plus, we love Blackjack!	That's great. How long have you been playing?
I have a very good friend and her live-in boyfriend of 5 years hit on me! I'm married, and he didn't care. He sickens me!	That is so awful. I would be very upset with them.
Yes, I was really surprised and I find it terrible behavior.	I'm sorry to hear that. What happened?

We went on a vacation a few weeks ago, and it really made me think back to our last vacation. It was with my father, the last one before he passed away.	That is sad. I am sorry to hear that. I hope you had a good time.
I did, but of course, wished I had more time. He passed away unexpectedly, so I was going over that vacation in my mind too. I miss him.	I am sorry to hear that.
I was pleasantly shocked the other day when I won on a lottery ticket! I hardly ever win and I won $200!	That is awesome, are you going to buy a house?
I just tucked it back for a rainy day. But, I may splurge with it this weekend, since it was unexpected.	Oh that is interesting. I hope you enjoy it.

My husband sure did surprise me with his handiness and hard work around the house last week. He was able to accomplish so much work in a few days!	That's awesome!  I bet you were proud of him.  I don't have a husband, but I do love to hear about other people's husbands!
Ok	I was the first person to receive a pretigious award at my college after years of the award being on offer.	That is a great accomplishment!  Did you win a million dollars?
At the department office back at the school.	Oh, what happened?

One of my coworkers really ticked me off one day. She decided she would delegate some work to me by slamming on my desk and demanding I do it. She had some nerve!	Oh no, I hope you were able to handle it well.
Yes, she doesn't have the right to do that. I have been that many years longer than her, and it was her work! I let her know it too.	That's very mature of you.
One year my cousin wasn't going to get her young son anything for Christmas. It broke my heart so my husband and I bought his Santa gifts that year.	I would have been so upset!
The little guy deserved a Christmas and we really loved him.	Oh, I'm sorry to hear that, do you have any other kids?
When I went to the fair last year, I tripped on a large cord they had going across the walkway. It was a long, running fall! I wanted to hide!	That is really scary, I hope you were okay!
Scuffed knees, but mainly my pride. I was also in front an attractive guy I knew so it was even worse.	That is so bad.  I hate when I get scuffed up like that.

My husband and I are at a point in our lives, we are able to save, afford all that we need and save for retirement. I'm so appreciate we can, as I know many aren't able to do that.	I'm glad to hear that. What kind of savings do you have?
Yes, we have been working hard, as well as not always getting all the extras we would like at times. But, it's worth having some financial freedom!	That's great. I'm glad you're working hard.
One day at work while I was pregnant, I fell! Luckily, the baby and I weren't hurt, but I wanted to waddle away so fast!	Oh my gosh, that sounds scary!  I'm so glad you were okay!
Yes, it really was quite so!	What happened?

There are times I feel a bit alone and down. My husband has to travel out of town for work quite often.	I'm sorry to hear that. Do you have a close friend or family member that you can talk to about your feelings?
Well, yes, of course. But, that isn't quite the same, is it.	What are you talking about?

My children recently started school again and it made me feel a bit apprehensive. They are growing up so quick, and I know it won't be long before they sadly move out of the house :(	I know it's hard, but it's a good thing. They will be happy and healthy.
For sure! But, it flies by before you know it. I get my nerves on edge when I think about them all moved out of the house.	I understand. I have a similar situation with my sister.
Despite working until a few hours before, I scored highly on the ACT the first time I took it back in high school years ago.	I'm glad you scored well, what subject did you score high in?
Thanks. I thought I'd do poorly because I was tired.	Why were you tired?
Not that long ago, my husband planned a secret trip for us! I didn't have a clue he was doing it and was pleasantly shocked. It was so much fun!	That's great. How long was it?

We just took a weekend trip to Tunica, MS. We stayed at a really nice casino hotel and just played some Blackjack, enjoyed good food and each other's company!	I love the Mississippi coast.  Is that your first time there?
I lied to my mother one day about where I was going. It made me feel pretty bad and have a bad conscience.	I'm sorry to hear that, but sometimes it's necessary to lie to protect yourself.
She didn't want me going with that friend, but I wanted to go, so I lied to her. I was much younger then.	What did she say?
I won a free trip to Florida. It's not the best vacation, but I'll take it for free.	That's awesome!  What did you do?
I've been to Florida many times before so it wears on you.	I've been to Florida only once. It's a beautiful place, but I know it's always the same for people.
I won a lottery for a small amount of money.	Oh wow, that's awesome!
No, I wish. It was only a few hundred dollars.	That's a lot of money.
A good friend of mine moved away recently and we lost contact. I really wish we would still speak.	I am sorry to hear that.  I hope you can reconnect with your friend.
That's a good idea. Maybe I'll try that soon.	It's never too late to start something new, I think.
Someone was speeding on the road and I got into an accident with them. My car was totalled because of their carelessness.	Wow that's terrible.  I hope you are okay!
Yes, but not as much as the car was worth and it wasn't an enjoyable situation.	That is too bad.  I bet it was a tough situation to get out of.
I let a friend watch my dog for a week while I was out of town. I would've been devastated if anything happened to him.	That's good that you were able to let them watch him.
I hope so. I've only had my dog for a short time and this is my first time away from him.	That's very nice of you. How old is your dog?
I have been feeling great about life recently. My relationships have been going very well	I'm glad to hear that! Life is full of ups and downs, but it sounds like you're having a good time.
I am not, but I have a person I am very fond of. Are you?	That is very nice. What is your name?
I got a surprise gift in the mail yesterday.	That's awesome! What kind of gift?
A gorgeous vase. It's so pretty. I have no idea who sent it.	That's great! Who did it?
Yes, I love flowers. I can't wait to fill it up.	My sister broke my vase. I was pretty enraged!	I am sorry, that is horrible!  I hope you were able to fix it.
I scolded her but then told her it was okay, but it's not the biggest deal!	I think you mean you scolded her and then told her it was okay.
I'm am upset today because my daughter who lives really far away called and said her baby was admitted to the hospital.	That is so sad! What happened?
He was premature so he's been having some breathing issues. I hate not being there.	Nice, you must miss him
I'm so taken by the talents of contestants on the show Face Off -- have you ever seen it?	I have. I love it. It's so entertaining.
Their abilities to both imagine and create their characters is incredible!	That's really interesting! I have never seen anything like it before.
A lot people know Toys-R-Us has completely shut down not long ago.	I am so sad to hear that.  Did they really close down?
Yeah, a lot of my friends and I got to thinking of all our memories there. Really makes you think back.	I know what you mean.  It's funny how things can bring up such good memories.
I feel so bad, I forgot my sisters birthday...	I am sorry to hear that.  Are you going to make it up to her?

Yes I plan on it, its just been stressful time at home with a toddler, it slipped my mind	Oh no, that is so stressful!  I have a toddler as well.  I hope you get it all taken care of soon.  It is hard when you have to do everything yourself.
I love my husband so much I could never cheat on him.	I'm glad you have a healthy relationship.
Yea, I wouldnt want to hurt him, i cant understand anyone who does.	I don't think anyone should ever hurt another person.
It can be really tough when your husband and teenagers have electronics.	I know, I feel like they are so much more connected to their phones than us.
I do for family time but sometimes I can sit in a full room and still feel no one is there	What do you do for fun?
Tomorrow is my husbands Birthday!	What is your husband's name?
Yes, we are going out for a nice dinner. We haven't been on a date in months!	That's great. What kind of restaurant do you think you will go to?
I love the holidays, that make think back to being a kid.	I know, I love Christmas. It's so magical.
Yea, that would really be great. Or maybe we'd get bored.	That would be great.  I'm looking forward to hearing more about it.
There is a big storm going on in my town right now!	That's terrible! Is it going to be bad?
I don't, it makes me nervous with the strong winds and rain!	That is a bad one. I don't like it when it is raining and it is so heavy.
My favorite game has an expansion on Monday, I can't wait.	That sounds exciting! I've been wanting to play that game.
World of Warcraft, It's been my favorite for years.	That's so cool. I've never played it. How long have you played?
I just got a promotion at my job!	Oh congratulations! What a wonderful thing to happen!
I work in Human Resources for a big company, I wasn't expecting the promotion! Feel Blessed :)	I bet.  Did you expect it?
I really like every shelf in my house to be arranged just so.	Oh wow, I have never done that before, but I love it. Is it for storage?
I do, everything is in it's place. It thoroughly bothers me when someone puts random stuff on them, like cups or papers.	That is a good point. I feel the same way.
I just found out my husband is cheating on me..	That is awful. I am so sorry. I hope you can get through this.
A few months, I'm not sure what my next move is. Staying in a hotel for a few days to think.	That's good, you can always go back home.
My daughter is finally fully potty trained!	That is such an accomplishment! I bet you are so proud.
Yes, I am very happy as well! No more buying diapers haha	That's good! Diapers can be expensive.
So, my new puppy is adorable though maybe not as amazing yet as yours.	I'm sure she is! I love dogs!
She's so cute and fun, i love her already.	I love a girl that is fun. I'm a bit jealous of you.
I started doing more research on salaries for the degree I'll have in 6 months.	I am sure you will get a good job
It seems to be about 60,000 per year just out of college. I am eager to see if the statistics are correct.	That is a lot of money.  I hope you do well.  I am jealous.
I know it's silly, but my friend got something I wanted in a game the other day, bit sad.	That is sad, why did you want it?
I guess, little things at times right?	I know, but I just want to make sure I'm the best person I can be.
I watched The Lion King today with my daughter, reminded me of my childhood.	I love the movie.  What did you like about it?
Yes! I'm excited for that as well. I watched the movie with my mom when it first came out!	That's awesome! What movie?
5	Oh no! What happened?
Opps. Ok, i mean that I was sad the other day because a friend is moving.	That's sad. I hope you will stay in touch with your friend.
not to far, but it's still sad to see her go.	That's unfortunate.  Have you talked to her before she leaves?
I have been having a rough week!	What is going on?
Yes but I am afraid I might loose my job..	I hope that does not happen.
I hate how our country is right now.	That is not good. What is wrong with the country?

was travelling 14 hours internationally. First flight got delayed and the airline would not apologize and provide altenative	Oh no, I hate it when that happens.

I once accidently ran down the battery on my car when I mid-judged how long I could run the radio for without the engine running. It was 5am and I was in the middle of nowhere. I called the first person I could think of who could help and they came with crocodile clips and recharged the battery. I felt so grateful to be on the receiving end of a kind act. I was also embarrassed that I had let that happen and I learned from it!	What a great story! I'm glad you learned from it.

Yeah for sure! It was one of those things that once it happens once then you definitely know the limits of the car's battery power without engine running - so you make sure it won't happen again!	I would agree, it's a good thing to know the limits of your car's power.
I'm ready for college football to start. I can't wait for kickoff weekend!	I love football! What school do you go to?
Auburn Tigers	I'm a big fan of the football team.
I did something really foolish at the grocery store yesterday.	Oh no! What did you do?
I was reaching for some pasta sauce and knocked a few of them over. They shattered on the ground a such a huge mess that two workers had to come mop it up.	That was a mess! Did they clean it up?

Oh yeah, definitely! He put in a ton of work and it all paid off!	Oh yeah, that's great!  What did he do?

I once had a long walk home from the railway station with two very heavy bags. It turned out that another person had also missed the last bus and had to walk much of the journey with me as his home was in the same direction as mine. The two bags I had had some expensive DJ equipment but they were VERY heavy so when they guy who had to walk home the same way said he would help by carrying one of the bags I trusted him! He didn't disappoint, he helped me get home earlier and without a bad back; while the kindness of strangers made what a potentially bad night to a reasonably pleasant one - all down to trust!	That is a great story! It's so nice to see that people still have those kind of qualities.

It's one of those things that in the day time you might expect but this was like 1am so I'm sure he would have wanted to get home as soon as he could but he chose to make his night harder to make my night easier.	That is so cool, you must have a very good friend to have.

Yes, I hurt my back and couldn't even go to work. Shouldn't the dog be on a leash. Ugh!	I'm sorry to hear that, are you able to go to work now?
My transmission in my car went out the other day, maybe it won't be too expensive to repair.	What kind of car do you have?
Yes they are. I had just put a down payment on a house too, so my money is tied up.	That's a big step. I hope you find the right home.
I am fuming. I saw someone key my car while I was at the grocery store the other day.	Oh no. That is terrible. Did you take a picture?
No, I was checking out when I saw it happen. I didn't even know them. I don't know why anyone would do something like that.	Oh no, that's terrible. What did they do?

I did. the scenes were really rewarding. also felt good to have all the tools and skills necessary	That is awesome! I am glad you felt that way.

I'm sorry if I was unclear, I mean that the band were playing completely live (with no backing track).	I understand that, but I'm not sure I would want to listen to live music, it's so unpredictable.
So I learned to bowl using two hands yesterday and it was my best game ever!	That is awesome! What is your name?
Yes, very! It's also way more fun for me to put spin on the ball than traditional style bowling.	I think you may be right.

We were only gone for 2 hours! You just can't leave them alone I guess	Oh that's terrible, I'm so sorry to hear that.
I am starting a new phase in my life. Completed all debt and off to a new start	That's great! You must be happy to be free from debt!
yes very. but I know that it will be good.	What do you mean?
Thanks! I hope to learn from my mistake and continue to progress	Oh good. What did you do?
I try to be. it can be difficult on some days, but I think I have a good attitude towards most things	I can relate. I have a very good attitude towards most things.

Thanks! I've realized that school is extremely important and I can't squander my opportunity away.	That is so right! You are very lucky to have that opportunity!

My friend bought a house in a very cheap market town and 6 months later a very walthy company opened an enormous regional HQ there. No, but I was shocked at how a small 12 pound ball can carry you down the lane due to the momentum. It was quite funny.	Oh that is crazy! What kind of ball was it?
My brother got a nice new toyota 4runner for his first car! I'm lowkey kind of mad at him for it.	That's awesome! What kind of car is it?

I wasn't sure at first and, being in a wheelchair, had nowhere to go. Then the dark figure stopped in front of me. I thought I'd had it. Turns out it was my neighbor who couldn't sleep, walking her dog!	Wow! I didn't expect that.

It is now. But it sure wasn't at the time. I was frantically looking around for something to beat my "attacker" off with!	I stress eat a lot. I decided i need to control it and i didn't eat sweets for more than a week. very proud of myself	Oh really? What kind of sweets did you eat?

Not with traffic, but with the people upstairs - they're a cross between hyenas and elephants!. My new place was quiet when I was there, so fingers crossed!	That sounds so annoying! I hate it when my place is quiet, too.

i have food on my table, a roof over my head and clothes to wear. I'm happy and thankful	That's great! I'm glad you have those things.
yes. Some people take these things for granted. it's really easy to take things and people for granted	I know what you mean. Sometimes I think people take their friends for granted.
so i decided to make a blanket and i got a sawing machine and got patterns and stuff. it tuned out to be so easy! I actually made 3 blankets	Oh wow! I bet it was fun to do.
thank you! I do want to take more and to give them to my friends who recently had babies	I'm sure you will, your kindness is so admirable.

Very hard and this was before the days of smartphones and FaceTime. We spent a fortune on telephone calls. I remember when my father had to use a phone book to look up someone's number.

Me too. That was one of the happiest trips of my life. The happiest was when we got married six months later!	When I spend time with my family, it reminds me how lucky I really am.	That's great!  I love spending time with my family as well.

Definitely. Even when times get rough, there are still so many things to be thankful for. I did not always realize that, but glad I do now.	I know right? Sometimes it's hard to see that when things are bad. But it's true.

She is a golden retriever. Do you have any pets?	I have a cat. I have a dog too.

Oh yes, I really like school and my classmates and stuff! I guess just because summer is coming to an end?	i love summer too but i hate school

yes but when i catch myself judging somebody i feel so guilty and bad	That's a good thing, it's a good feeling.

My brother just turned 16 and he's about to get his first car! I'm so excited for him.	That's really cool!  What kind of car?
Probably some kind of SUV, maybe an Xterra or 4runner. Should be awesome when he gets it!	That sounds like a nice car!

I want an SUV, like an Xterra or 4runner. They are pricy though!	Oh yeah, they are.
Recently my husband and I were traveling home from visiting his family when all of a sudden a car cuts us off	Oh no! Were you okay?
I have no idea how we didn't hit them but it was so scary	That is the worst!  I am so sorry that happened to you.  What happened?
My oldest child's birthday is next week and it always makes me emotional.	Oh, I'm so sorry.  I know how that feels.  What did you do to celebrate?
She will be 30. It makes me feel so old, but also how fun it was when they were little.	That's true, I've been there too.
I feel so much better about myself and life in general now that I	I'm glad you feel better.
Sorry, I accidentally hit enter haha. Now that I've been working out for about a month!	Oh yeah! That's always a good feeling.

I just enjoyed grocery shopping for the first time in a very long time. I've found my perfect restaurant/store and spent a very happy 40 mins or so wandering around it.	That's really nice.  I love shopping for food.  I enjoy it.
Yes, it's both. I got a chickpea curry with basmati rice that a local Indian lady made. And a bag of dragon tongue beans, which are delicious!	That sounds delicious!  I'm a big fan of Asian food.
They're the same shape as regular green beans, but lighter in color and they have red streaks through them. You treat them as you would green beans.	What is the name of the plant?

What I love about this store is it sources all of its produce locally and its all organic. So you get some strange, different things to try!	I love when stores do that!  It's such a treat to try new things and be able to see the freshness of the food.
I came home from work last night and my step dad scared me!	Oh no!  What happened?
Like he jumped out from behind a door and scared me. I was not expecting it!	Oh no, I hope you are okay!

Yeah it was gross. He probably should get stitches.	Oh yeah? I bet you are right.

It's awful. I really wish far more resources were put toward mental health facilities and counselling in this country!	I agree. It is a shame.
Most definitely. We actually need these resources to get mentally disturbed people off the streets and get them the help they deserve.	I agree. It is a big problem.

There's so much we could be doing to help those in need and yet our politicians (on both sides!) are off helping the rich and corporations - it's disgusting.	I hadn't been able to see my grandmother in quite some time b/c she lives so far away	That's sad, but it's good that you have the opportunity to see her now.

Well I was finally able to go and visit her and the house and visit was exactly as I remembered it as a child.  It gave me such great memories!	That is awesome! I love visiting places that remind me of the past.

I remember being on holiday and trying to find a way to watch an F1 race. I caught the beginning of the race in a bar before it closed and saw that my favourite driver had had a puncture and fallen to last place. My mate asked me what the chances were of him winning from that position? I said 1000 to 1. By the time we were back at the hostel, I learned that he had indeed won the race in what many believe was the greatest single event in the sport's history!	That's a good story.  I think it's a pretty good story.  I bet you felt pretty good about yourself for that.

Yeah, for sure! It was one of those nights where we were journey is what's fun rather than what you were aiming to do, if you get me. We went from sports bar to sports bar trying to see who would show the event and by the time we gave up we'd had such a funny night and the race had turned out great!	I bet. I bet it was fun
I didn't know until the other day that kids have different teachers for different subjects starting in 5th grae.	That's a bit of a shock.  I always thought it was the same teacher.

That's true.  I was a little startled b/c I don't remember changing classes for things until 7th grade.  Just a reminder that kids grow up so much faster now.	That's a good point. I remember when I was in middle school, and I was still in high school.

That's true - when I was in kindergarten, we only went for half the day. I bet you were so relieved to have that done.  I never thought about it but I should have done that.
It feels good to get everything together, doesn't it? You feel as if you're ready for anything!	I am ready to start my new job.

he actually speaks 2 languages. I teach him english and russian	That's amazing! I would love to learn one of those.

What did she do to keep herself busy?
Yes, she should. She joined a community garden and helps out there, she got a part time job and took up badminton - not something she'd ever done before!	That's great.  How old is she?

She's a very strong person and she also has lots of friends and family to help her. She's a lovely person and deserves the best in life!	I just got Hulu Live. It's been amazing to watch TV again!	I am a big fan of TV.  I am glad you enjoy it.
I love to watch Home shows on HGTV and Bachelor in Paridise on ABC. Hulu live has been a great value for the price!	I love HGTV!  They have so many fun shows.  They are always so funny!

I get so tired of hearing about people being mean to animals.	What kind of animals?
Right, these poor animals have no clue why people are mean to them. Some people are heartless.	I agree, there are people who are mean and hurt others.

For some reason I've been thinking of our family Christmases back when I was a kid. I so enjoyed decorating the tree, helping my Mom with preparing lunch. And of course, eating Christmas lunch! Fun times.	I'm sure those are great memories for you. Do you still enjoy those times?
It's nice to think back, tho' and relive the old days. We have our own traditions now, but the good old days will always remain just that!	I agree, I think it's nice to remember the past.

It's funny, we always remember the successful, fun times and forget about the not-so-perfect things. Must be our minds' defense kicking in!	Do you know anyone who spends a ton on eating out every week? It's crazy to me how much they spend.	I know, I mean, I'm happy for them, but it seems like they are spending a lot of money.

Yes, exactly. A friend was telling me they spent almost $300 a week on eating out. I don't even spend that much on groceries.	I can imagine.  That is not a good habit to have.  Is it a habit you are trying to break?

Texas, there's so much to do there so I'm happy for the change.	I love Texas!

Oh yes, and then some! They both looked so well and had lots to say. What a laugh we had. I'm so fortunate to have such a wonderful family!	That's great to hear! I am so glad you have such a wonderful family!

in science of medicine it was really a fun exppirience	My wife has been out of the country for 2 months, and is getting back in a week.  I'm super pumped!	That's awesome! I'm sure you're looking forward to it!

My rent tripled in three years. I couldn't afford to stay - just too expensive. Anyway, a friend had driven across with me and it wasn't until he'd gone that I realized I was alone. Silly, huh?!	That's a great friend. I'm sorry you have to deal with it.

Oh no - I'm not a race car driver, lol. And anyway, it's kind of fun seeing different parts of the country, so rushing would (to me) be a waste.	My wife was really sick the other day, she was stuck in bed for most of the day.	That is so sad. I hope she is feeling better now.
Not completely sure, maybe just a stomach bug or something.  She's ok now, though her appetite took a bit to come back.	Well I hope it is nothing serious!

i feels surprised	I'm glad you're happy for yourself.  What happened?

I just watched JFK's speech, 'we will go to the moon' - reminds me of what I admire in the US	I love watching those documentaries about the history of the US, it's so fascinating!
It's really moving, wonder what the next big goal will be for humanity	I'm sure it is. It's always exciting to think about the possibilities.
The litter of puppies had been born!	Wow, that's a lot of puppies!
All of the puppies survived, truly a lucky amazing occasion!	What kind of dogs?
I was totally caught off guard as a kid when the entire yard was covered in Easter eggs	That is funny. I have never done that.
My dad, but he wouldn't admit it! haha	What did you do?

I did but it was ruined from the rain.	Oh no! I am so sorry to hear that.

Hopefully I don't get bad karma for my accidental theft!	Oh no! Did you steal from someone you know?
I attended a ball recently, one of the girls had the most stunning dress.	I would have loved to see it!

No way, her dress looked like little diamonds had been stitched on every inch of her dress. Not many girls can compete with that. Diamonds are forever.	That sounds pretty stunning.  I bet she was very happy with her appearance.
I had to schedule an appointment with the dentist after not visiting one in five years.	Did you have a toothache?
I do not have insurance. I went anyway because I had a problem with one tooth.	I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you got it covered somehow.
The internet has been there through thick and thin for me	That's great. I don't really have one.
True, it's a great resource to have	How?
Seeing animals sleep is very relaxing	I know right. I love watching them do that.
I don't know, I guess I'm just tired	What are you tired of?
My dog got hit by a car.	Wow! Did he survive?
Yeah. He didn't survive. I really miss him	That is so sad. Did you have him a lot?
I remember not having any responsibilities as a kid	That's great! You must have been very spoiled as a kid.

I found an old photo album of my family. It really brought back memories.	Oh really? What memories did it bring back of?

I should not have been so quick to let my teen take the car, but she was so excited.	What happened?
Well, let me just say that the pole made it out alright,lol.	What did you do to the pole?
She is, and now my car has a very crude imitation of a red racing stripe down the side!	After a gym workout I'm always ready to get back and hit a new PR	That's awesome! I love going to the gym!

I think just knowing that one day I'll be able to do things that are unimaginable right now, and I know I can do better the next time	I can relate to that. It's amazing how much we can accomplish in our lifetime.

I just pretended like nothing happened, but i'm worried everyone thinks it was something other than my stomach	Oh no, what happened?
I felt pretty good leaving the gym today, hit a new PR on overhead press	That's awesome! What weight were you lifting?
I like to try my hardest!	What do you try your hardest at?
I felt like I could do anything after I finished meditating	What did you do after?
I try to go longer everyday, I was able to go 50 minutes yesterday	I'm glad to hear that.  How many minutes a day?
I caught my boyfriend texting his ex	Oh no. That is not good.
I think he will dump me soon. He would rather be with her, I just know it	What's going on with him?
My friend has been working with me on the weekends to get my tennis game on the next level.	Wow that's awesome.  I hope you both do well!
yeah I can consistently serve with power and accuracy now. I feel almost decent now.	That's great! It's always nice to feel like you can accomplish something.
A while back I caught my partner at the time being dishonest to me.	Oh no, that must have been upsetting. What did they do?
We were together for a year and a half and we had a child together shortly before I found out!	That's so cool! What is your child's name?
High school was a great time, but those days are long gone	You have to be proud of yourself for making it through!
No bills to pay, going out to eat with friends all the time, pretty fun	I love going out to eat with friends!  How long have you been doing that?
Around 4 months ago, I had major surgery that caused me to be immobile for a few weeks.	I'm sorry to hear that, I hope you are recovering well.

Well, I had lots of support from my family, but I felt afraid of getting back into the swing of things for fear of failing. I felt so vulnerable.	That is a good thing to feel.  It's nice to feel vulnerable and not be too confident.
I love going to the gym because I feel stronger	I love going to the gym too.  I like to get a little sweaty and feel good about myself.
Probably half a year, been the most consistent in my life, how about you?	I am consistent too but I am not sure if it is healthy to be so.
It's tough to talk to my parents, but I try to talk about things we don't disagree on	I am sure they will appreciate that.
Anything political or religious really, or relationships	I don't really have any, I'm just a dude.
I had my dog for 13 years before she passed away last year from cancer. It was devastating!	I'm so sorry. That's terrible.
Probably not for a while. She was a great companion, but I don't think my heart is ready to bring in a new dog quite yet.	You are right. I would be happy to have a dog.
I was horribly wronged by someone I thought I could trust. The feeling was devastating, and I've always struggled with forgiveness.	That's awful! I'm sorry to hear that. Did you find out who it was?
They were dishonest and physically cruel. We have gone our separate ways, but I truly hope they can learn to treat others better.	I'm sorry to hear that. I hope they learn from their mistakes.
Last month I came home from work and noticed my cat wasn't feeling well, so I rushed her to the vet. I had to put her down.	That is so sad. I am sorry to hear that.
I know, I just really miss her. Poor cancer kitty. I loved her so much.	That is so sad.
MY roommate got a new cat last week, and we finally let them meet today. I was so nervous and worried about it.	That sounds fun! I'm sure they got along well.
It went okay. My cat bopped him a little and growled a lot but no real swipes. So better than expected I guess.	That sounds like a pretty good day!
When I was pregnant with my first born, it was considered a high risk pregnancy. It made me very worried and anxious throughout.	I am sorry to hear that.  How was it?
I had to have emergency surgery in the end, but being able to hold my healthy baby was the greatest blessing I could have asked for.	Did you have a baby?
I'm so happy summer classes are officially over and I'll be able to relax for a week!	I agree, summer is the best. I have a vacation coming up and I'm so ready for it.

I'm not even sure what to do with all this time! I guess I should relax or have some leisure time, but everything in me says to try and be productive even on break. It's that school mentality.	That is a good thing. You will be fine.

I'm going to wear it to a party. Everyone will have their eyes on me!	That sounds fun!

Wonderful! It's definitely hard work, but I continue on, even on the days I don't want to. Today I discovered I can now comfortably run an uphill mile and I feel very confident!	What kind of workout did you do today?

I was very upset, especially considering how long it took me to get it set up. I loved laying in my peaceful hammock to read.	That is so nice.  Did you have a hammock?

We reminisced about old times. It was very nice, indeed. It was nice hearing from him, especially during some rough times!	That's great.  Did you guys get to talk about old times?

I keep having these dreams that I am out in public and somehow my clothes disappear. It's awful.	That's so creepy! I hate when that happens too.

I hate those dreams, I feel anything but free. They're really uncomfortable and make me nothing but a ball of negative emotions like anxiety as I spend the majority of the dream trying to find clothes and get away from people.	I don't like those dreams either. I would be very anxious.

I'm starting to feel like I will never be able to afford a house. They're just so expensive. And the market has been going up here about 5% a year for the past 10 years.	That is so true. It is a huge pain to pay rent on a house.

Before 9th grade. I moved away that summer. Seeing her brought back a lot of good memories	I am sure it did!  I have moved a few times myself, but that one was tough.

Absolutely. Yet, these people have a horrible way of twisting things in order to guilt you, even if you'd done nothing wrong! It's a very manipulating and confusing feeling.	It can be so hard to deal with.

I received a very odd message today. It came from a person who I blocked online, but they managed to find a loophole and messaged me by way of an inactive group.	That is the worst. I hate when that happens. Did you tell them to leave you alone?

They were just trying to find ways to contact me. I have literally blocked them on all social media. It seems borderline stalkish, and it makes me very anxious.	That's really scary, what do you think they want?
