I'm usually in a big city that I'm familiar with, and roam around in the dream until I get stalked, jumped, and sometimes very hurt.	I'm sorry you have to go through that.

I sure have, but it's such hard work. I make sure to work out, even on the days that I don't want to. It's definitely taken a lot of will power.	I am sure you do. It is really important to take care of yourself, especially if you want to have any children.

I had a high risk pregnancy up until a few months ago. I felt the most grateful I'd ever been when my baby turned out healthy.	I'm glad you are doing well. I'm a little jealous because my baby is still so small!

I adore my girlfriend. I am getting very serious about not leaving her side.	That's great! I'm glad to hear that you're thinking about her. What do you think you could do to keep her?
Thank you. Do you have a romantic interest?	I do. I'm going to be seeing him on Saturday.

Mosquitoes, and those dreadful flying ants. They're everywhere!	I have had to deal with them before.  They can be quite annoying.

It was very wet and I took a turn at too high of a speed.	Oh no! Are you okay?

Thank you. I know that, even though it's challenging, I need to be patient in order to improve our relationship.	I can only imagine how difficult that must be. I hope you are able to improve your relationship.

I hope so. I think that time heals all wounds.	I hope so too.  I am always looking forward to the future.

That's a great way of looking at it. I should try to keep a positive attitude towards it.	That's a good way to approach things.

My friend just took her kids to Disneyland and I feel a little bad about it.	I am sure they have a great time.

I had a blast. I met people from all over the country, visited many historical sites, and learned a lot about how government works	That sounds like a lot of fun. What a great experience!

About 20 friends, surprising her at her favorite bar after work.	My 25th high school reunion is coming up and I'm excited.	I'm sure you're going to have a great time.
Honestly? There was this girl who really treated me poorly - I can't wait for her to see how successful I have been!	That is sad, I hope she gets the help she needs.
A hurricane hit my city. The first night I thought the wind was going to tear the roof off the house	Oh no, that's terrible.  What did you do to protect your house?

I am loyal to my principles, that is why I do not eat meat, because I love life	Oh that's so good.  I don't eat meat either.  Do you have a favorite type of meat?

I healthy physically and spiritually	My daughter recently broke curfew by three hours!	Oh wow!  What happened?

They are sick	that's bad, is it a serious illness?

It drives me bonkers when she does that	I'm sorry, what do you mean?

I saw these 4-color Bic pens in the store the other day. I remember when I was young and getting one was like Christmas morning!	That sounds like so much fun. I remember getting a 10-er pack of pens. I used them all up.
Yes! My mom used to always get me one each year before school started. Those were the coolest pens in the world!	Oh that is so sweet!  How old were you when that started?

Nothing- I still haven't seen her. I felt pretty let down - but hopefully I can make the trip to see her soon.	I am sorry.  Are you sure you haven't seen her?

Fortunately no- she cleaned it up. But she had just had spaghetti and it was floating in it. It was so gross!	Oh my goodness. I would have been so upset.
I was livid when I went to work the other day and saw my car was broken in to	I am so sorry to hear that. Did they take your car?
I heard it was happening in other areas but didn't expect it here because we live in a nice neighborhood. So frustrating	Did you get to see what it was?
Every year when the kids go back to school, it brings back so many memories of when my kids were going to school.	Oh, that's sad.  What were some of those memories?

I would cry the first day of school every year, especially the milestone years. Now my grandchildren are starting school. Time flies by too quickly	I know how you feel, it was so long ago. I hope you have a great time with your grandkids.

LOL, I swear it was like I sat down and they were gone!  Probably gave myself diabetes. So not going to be able to eat the rest of the day!	Oh no! I hope you get some food soon!

I didn't think it would hit me hard. I felt like I was prepared.	That's good to hear. Did you have any idea it could happen?

He told me that the baby's heart rate had dropped and they had to preform an emergency C-section right then.	That is very scary. I am sorry.
Yes, everything turned out fine. She is a healthy and happy three year old. It was the scariest day of my life though.	Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that.  That sounds like a scary time.
Yes, they do. I ope your boy is all good now.	I finally beat level 150 on the crucible today in my favorite game Grim Dawn.	That is really cool. What game is it?
PC all the way. I've been grinding devotion points all week.	What is devotion?

It's not cute, and she's nine. By old flowers I mean, it's a green, stagnant slush with mold growing on top.	That's not cute at all. What did you do about it?

I fell down, and apparently said some embarrassing things.	Oh no, did you get in trouble?

Yes, I will. She has been under a lot of stress.	That's so good to hear! I hope she feels better soon!

Its a disease that attacks the nervous system. It was really scary to find out I had it. I just went blind in my right eye one day. Two days and several test later I found out I had MS.	That is really bad.  I have a friend who has MS.  He has a lot of trouble walking and has gotten very sick.

I feel really sad because I felt she should have told me.	I am sorry to hear that.  Is it someone you care about?

I think that I will do good on my test.	What test are you taking?
It is tonight. I studied really hard.	Wow, you must be ready for the test.
I heard a song that I hadn't heard in awhile. It reminded me of my high school days	I love that. What song was it?
Yes, it had me feeling nostalgic about the times when I was young.	That's great. What made you feel nostalgic?
My dad dies when I was 33 years old.	That is terrible.  Did you have any family members left?
Thank you. I was crushed, and it left me with questions about my own mortality.	That is terrible, I'm sorry to hear that, but I hope you find peace.
My mother fell and injured herself. I wanted help and comfort her in any way possible.	Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that. I hope she's okay.
Yes, but bhe bruised her wrist, and had a concussion. I wish that I was there for her when it happened.	I'm sorry to hear that, I hope she is okay now.

I did, but I find it hard to trust people. Especially at work.	That can be tough. Do you think you will ever trust someone again?

I started quitting drinking soda and it is easier than you think.

I still need wait another week.	Oh no, I hope it doesn't take too long.
A drafter.	I just went to clean my kids sink a few minutes ago. I found a bunch of toys in the catch and I am mad.	Oh no! I hope you can find them all!
Yeah, all the toys are out. But, they got some explaining to do after school.	That's a bummer. It's hard to explain to kids.

Combination of stress and new meds I think. Maybe I can get back to my old scheduled soon.	Oh that is bad.  What is going on?

Holding each of my children for the first time was amazing.	That sounds so special. What were you holding?

Absolutely! I called her the next day and made sure to visit her. :)	I am sure she is happy to see you

Absolutely! I've always been scared of heights, but I'm so glad I made myself.	That's a good attitude to have.
When I was a kid, I had a dog at my grandpa's. He gave it away because it wouldn't hunt.	Oh wow, I bet it was a sad day for you.
I was very upset. I was only like nine at the time so I took it really hard.	Oh no, I am sorry to hear that. I am sure you will be fine.
I tripped and fell in front of some people.	Oh no! Did you hurt yourself?
No, only my pride was injured.	I'm sorry to hear that.

Yeah, she passed more than five years ago and I had forgotten all about it. It brought back so many memories though!	Oh no, I'm sorry to hear that.
I just won an award for best yard in the neighborhood!	Oh wow, congratulations! What is the award for?
I did, mowed it three times a week and watered it twice a day. All the hard work really paid off.	That is great.  I am sure it was hard work.  Did you get a nice reward?

It is, it really stands out from all the brown grass in my neighbors yards.	I get to go to the park today for a BBQ with friends, it should be so much fun!	That sounds like a lot of fun. What do you usually do at the park?
We often throw around a frisbee for a little bit, but we never get too intense with any sports.	Did you ever play sports in school?
Me too, there has been a lot of rain lately. It should be fun hanging out with old friends!	I love rain, it is so relaxing
I snuck some candy out of my daughter's snack stash. I feel bad because I had been trying to diet.	That's so nice of you. Do you feel guilty?
Otherwise it's been pretty good- I've managed to lose 12 pounds! Just wish I could let the sugar cravings go.	I am sure you will be fine. I have had the same problem and it is hard to resist.
My childhood friend gave me a watch for by birthday a few years ago, I lost it in a move recently. I'm pretty upset by it.	Oh no! That's so sad. I'm sure you'll be able to find it.
I've actually checked and went through all the boxes too. Here's hoping it turns up one day though!	Wow, I bet that was exciting!
I let my daughter ride in the road by herself on her skateboard the other day.	Oh no! Did she do okay?
She did great. She's pretty good about looking out for cars.	That is really nice of her. I bet you are proud of her.
It is so upsetting that my daughter was in a car accident. I am thankful that she was fine but we lost our car because of someone's bad judgment.	That is so terrible, I am sorry to hear that.
It was. They wanted to blame my daughter but it was their fault.	Oh, that's terrible. They should be ashamed.

I was recently on a long international flight and we hit some really bad turbulence.	Oh my gosh, did you get hurt?

We did and I made sure to not screw that one up!	What did you do?

Me too. Who knows what would have happened to me if I did it twice.	I was able to go back home to my parents for a few weeks recently. It was wonderful to relax in my childhood home.	That's great. I wish I could go back to my childhood home.
They loved having me around again! Our ten year old dog wouldn't leave my side.	That's great! What kind of dog is it?

No, they make rough pavement feel smoother. I think I'll just keep the ones I have for now though. Just have to deal with having a rough ride.	I feel you.  I'm a little scared to even drive on rough pavement.

It did not go well at all! She pooped all over the carpet and she never has accidents at home.	That is terrible!  I would be so mad!  Did you call the plumber?
Yeah, I think it might've been too much on her at once. I was pretty embarrassed.	I had to take my daughter to the doctor the other day. She was very sick.	That's awful. I hope she feels better soon.
It was just the flu. I got her some medicine, brought her home, and made tomato soup and grilled cheese sandwiches.	That sounds like a great idea. I am so sorry you got sick.
So my sister is getting married in a few weeks.	That is awesome! I am so happy for her!

Nice! We have a garage, but my wife takes up what little room isnt filled with junk with her car. Mine wouldnt fit anyway unless I cleared it out.	That's a bummer. I guess you'll just have to keep your car in the garage.

I do programming work and I recently had a question I had to run by a co-worker. He is a programming wizard. He easily handled my issue and was using terms and methods I had never even heard of.	That's nice of him. I wish I had a co-worker who could help me out.

I missed her while she was gone. We have a mixed breed rescue pup.	What happened to her?

Sometimes. It doesn't stop me from doing things, just slows me down and takes longer than it should to do the things I need to do.	That is a good point.  What do you do when that happens?

Yeah they do! Some times I wish I got to go visit grandma's like they do lol.	That is nice!  Do you ever get to see your grandma?

He's doing about as well as he can be. Very healthy, but without some new discoveries he will likely have a shortened lifespan.	I can't even imagine. What kind of discoveries?

Not too long ago, I took a trip on a plane. The airline lost my whole suitcase!	That's terrible. Did they get it back?
The whole vacation! I was so upset! I didn't have anything to wear for the duration.	Wow, that's bad.

My new job is starting tomorrow. I'm feeling nervous, but really optimistic about it.	That's great! I hope you have fun.

I hope you get the treatment you need.  I've been diagnosed with that as well and it's really tough.  How are you taking care of yourself?
Maybe, I haven't been back because I can't afford to go right now. I've just been dealing with the pain.	Oh no, that is terrible. I hope you can get back soon.

He is!  Especially since last year's team won the Opening Day Tournament and then won the Regular Season title!	That's so awesome. Did you watch them play?

Yep, i've never looked forward to something so much in my life. I still have the dreamcast as well.	That's awesome! I just got a new xbox console, so I can play some old games!
I'm gonna need your support here, because I'm going through something a little bit rough, okay?	Well, I'm here to help, so I'm ready to do whatever I can to help you through it.

Should I see a therapist or anything? Is this indicative of some deep-seated problem that I'm not aware of?	I'm not sure. I don't know if you are looking for help or not.
My Uncle Jebodiah is always looking out for me. He recently told me that he had a special concoction that if I drank it, it would cure my herpes.	What kind of concoction?
Listen, my Uncle Jeb wouldn't do me dirty like that. You may call it """snake oil""" but I call it the miracle cure this world needs. After all, it worked.	I am not sure if I believe it.
My cat was kept overnight at the vets recently. I was so worried!	That is not good! I hope everything turned out well.
She's fine now! They found out it was something minor after x-rays. I was so relieved.	That's good to hear! What was it?

My brother had to pick me up. He had to pull up behind me on the curb. It felt dangerous!	I bet that was scary!  How did it feel?

Look, can we just be honest with each other for a second? Having ebola shouldn't mean that I have to be grounded and miss out on my chance to walk on the moon during the upcoming lunar missions.	That's a good point. I'm not sure I agree.

I saw one, and he said if I gave him $25,000 he would clear me for flight, but I don't have that kind of money just lying around. It's a real bummer. Now I just have to do super boring NASA desk work like tracking comets. Lame.	I bet you are so bummed out about that.
I am obsessive about being ready for anything	Why is that?

I don't know.  I just see stuff in the grocery store and think I like that food and buy it because it is on sale.  Even if I already have it!	That's so common. I buy the same food for the same reason.
My girlfriend's leg was bitten off by a bull shark last summer.	Oh my goodness. That is scary. Did she survive?

She's fine now. I spent a month in the hospital with her, then was with her every day for three months while she was in rehab. She was out spreading sacrificial lamb's blood in the water on a fishing trip. Gotta love her.	I'm sorry to hear that.  I hope she is doing better now.

It was swallowed whole, unfortunately. I just hope the shark seasoned it properly. I won't stand for underprepared human thigh meat. Gordon Ramsay wouldn't have it, and neither will I.	I forgot about plans that I had made with my mother over the weekend.	That's too bad. I'm sure she will forgive you.
I called her right up and we rescheduled! I felt so bad though.	Did you feel bad?

They think someone needs to take his phone away	Oh no, what happened?

It was nice to find them all and think back to those simpler times	I am sure it was nice to look back.
The last trip I took to Chicago was by plane.	That is cool! Where are you from?
I had! I love chicago.  The flight is nice and short too, though I wasn't feeling well.	Oh, that's great, I've never been.  I wish I could go, I love Chicago too.

Yes.  They were $100 but they only sell 500 tickets.  And the money raised goes to breast cancer research	That's great to hear!
jumpfortherose.com	Someone helped me move.	That's really nice of them.
Yes, and I paid them with beer. I was thankful because I had a toe injury.	That's awesome!  I'm glad you were able to do that.  Beer is a great way to relax.
I bought a powerball ticket last week but did not win	Did you win?
I would have bought a new car and a house perhaps.  But I lost :-(	That is a bummer! What happened?
Yes.  Maybe next time I will win!	I spent Saturday night playing Lord of the Rings Online.	I have never played that game.
It is good, but I sometimes wonder if I'm trading real life for a fantasy world.	Yeah that can be a problem.  Are you feeling overwhelmed with the world?
I am so mad that our politicians won't do something to stop Russian hacking	I am too.  It is so infuriating.
Yes.  The Republicans just don't seem to care about our country any more and I am so mad that Putin owns Trump	That's really unfortunate.
My goldfish died.	I am sorry to hear that. I know it is very sad.
For 4 years. I'm bummed.	What happened?
Not yet.	I had an unprofessional job interview.	Well, what happened?
The receptionist ignored me, and my interviewer was not prepared.	I am sorry to hear that.  Did you speak to her about it?
My computer crashed while I was working on a project.	Oh no! I hope you were able to recover your work.
I did. I hadn't saved, and I forgot to set up autosave. It was very frustrating.	That's terrible. I'm so sorry. I can't imagine having to do that.
My favorite team blew a big lead in the playoffs. It was like drinking sour milk.	Oh no, what happened?
I hate when teams choke. It makes me sick.	I agree.
I woke up this morning and my eye is itchy and my right eyelid is drooping	I hope you feel better soon
yeah I am going to see what it seems like tomorrow - not sure if something got in it that scratched it or what	What did it look like?
Yeah I will if it does not get better quickly	Me and my family went to see a magic show for the first time today.	That was cool. What kind of show was it?
I didn't catch his name, but he pulled a rabbit out of his hat. Classic trick, but I'll never forget it!	That sounds like a good time. I bet you were amazed.
I have a job interview tomorrow. I'm looking forward to it.	I'm sure you will do great. I've had some interviews before and they're always a lot of fun.
Yes. It seems like a great opportunity.	Why is that?
I scored well on an aptitude test.	That's great! I hope you get the job you're looking for!
I had a few drinks. I felt good.	I'm not a big drinker.
So today my mother brought over a whole week of meals to help me out.	That is so nice of her.
Yes, she's always helping me out! I am so thankful for her she's an amazing mother.	That's really nice. How old is she?
So I moved away from my parents not too long ago. It's been a big change.	That can be a tough adjustment, especially if they were close. What made you move?
Out of state. I'm by myself now, so it's pretty quiet! I miss them a lot.	That is sad. How long have you been away?
My oldest child needed braces but her health insurance wouldn't cover the expense. It was close to 4000 dollars and we did not have that kind of money at the time.	I am sorry to hear that.

Yes they do. My aunt paid half of the cost for us and didn't has for any of it back because she knew we needed the help.	That is very kind of her.  I would be very grateful if someone like that showed kindness to me.
I was sitting on the couch after a long day taking care of work and all the mommy stuff the other day.	What did you do?
It was! My family was happy and together. Chatting and watching tv. Everything just felt right.	That is great! Did you have a big family gathering?
My husband used to work out of town in a different state Sunday through Thursday.	That's nice, I bet it was a big part of your life. Did you miss him?

Yeah, he does work hard. Even thought my children were with me and we kept our usual routines, I was miserable when he was gone. I would cry after he left every Sunday. Luckily now, he has a job where he is home everyday by supper time.	That's good to hear. Did you have kids?
We really are, he brings out the best in me.	I didn't have a car to get to and from work, so my parents actually let me just keep theirs for a bit!	That is so nice of them.
Yeah it was so giving of them to leave it to me for so long and helped me a ton!	That's good to hear, you must have been really busy.
While driving today I went past my grandma's old house. She passed last year.	I am so sorry to hear that.  I hope she is at peace.
Oh for sure. Good feelings, but I also miss her so much.	What happened to her?
I went outside to get my paper this morning. Someone had ran over my mailbox!	That's really rude! I hate when that happens!
No, it's completely demolished! I'm feeling pretty annoyed.	That's terrible. Did you have to throw out your house?
My sister is a journalist and she got her first big story published in the paper today!	Wow that's awesome!  Is she from the same city?
It is! It's a really big deal and I couldn't be happier for her.	That's great. What happened?
So my partner gave me the biggest surprise this week.	That is so nice!  What was the surprise?
He got us a trip to Hawaii! I couldn't believe it, I am so elated!	That's awesome. Where is it?
I finally went and adopted a cat last month and go way more than I expected!	What kind of cat?
Well it was only supposed to be her, but we found out she was pregnant! She popped out a whole litter of adorable.	That's great! Congratulations!

I had to leave town last week and that meant leaving my pets who are my babies. I needed someone who could take care of them properly.	Oh, that's terrible.  I am sorry.  Are they being cared for by someone?
It is very hard! The only one who I'd let do it was my sister and she did an amazing job.	That's great!  It is good that you have a sister to help.
So I finally decided to take my dog for his first dog park visit.	That sounds like fun, how did it go?
It's hard to tell! He refused to leave my side the entire time and just watched the other dogs play.	Oh no! What kind of dog is he?
Im embarrassed to admit I forgot to pick up my brother from worth the other day after agreeing to	Oh no, what happened?
Ha ha, he was a little miffed. He got over it though when I stopped and got him ice cream on the way back though! I felt like such a jerk.	That's awesome, I bet you got him a really good ice cream!
I finally took the plunge and decided to go back to school this year.	That's so exciting!  Are you taking any classes that you've always wanted to take?
I start next week! I was super hesitant at first, but I'm so glad I'm making myself do it.	That's great. What are you doing?
I was going through some stuff and found a box of jewelry my grandparents had gifted me through the years.	That's so cool! I love finding old family items.
Yeah, it really made me think of them and old times.	That is good, what happened?
I recently had a shop fix my car. They worked so fast!	That's great! I hope they fixed it for you quickly and for good!
I was able to go home, but I realize now that I didn't even have to	What do you mean?
My husband is going through the process of quitting smoking on top of dealing with drama from his parents. He is having a hard time.	That must be really tough for him. Is he getting help?

They aren't being supportive at all, but that's not surprising, that don't support him very well in anything. I just wish I could make it better for him, but I can't	That is so sad.  You need to be honest with him.  I don't think it's healthy to be dishonest with someone.
I have some great friends. One of them drove me to the airport tomorrow	Oh that's great! I'm glad you have friends who can do that for you.
Yes I am, they are great	I'm glad you are happy.
We just found out the person working in our accounting department has been stealing money from our company for years.	I'm sorry to hear that. Did you report it to the authorities?
Yes, it just makes me sick to my stomach. You think you know someone but the whole time they are stealing you blind. I don't get some people	I can relate.  I don't know how they can do it.
I miss high school. My girlfriend was the best	I'm sure she was. How long have you two been together?
That's great. College was also fun	I loved college! It was so much fun.
I recently bid farewell to a good friend. I miss her	That is a bummer.  How old is she?
Thank you, that means a lot. I will see her again	I am sure you will, and I hope you have a great time!
I lost my car keys. I'm such a fool!	I've been there.  It's not the end of the world.  You can always call a locksmith to get them made.

That's pretty funny, and makes me feel better. This is the first time I've lost my keys so I hope to keep it that way!	Yeah, I lost my keys once too.  I was so stressed out that I was on the verge of losing it all.
I came home the other day and my roommate had a friend over. I've only seen him with a friend over once in my 3.5 years of living here.	Oh no!  Was it a surprise?
Yeah I sure was, he seems to like this one much better than the last one he had over. He couldn't wait for that first guy to leave.	That is the worst, I hate it when that happens

One of my co-worker came and asked me a lot of really weird questions about my supervisor. It seemed suspicious so I pretty much told her I didn't know any of the answers to her questions. I don't think she likes my supervisor.	I would be a little suspicious about my supervisor as well.
Yeah I figured it was, so I just played dumb and let my supervisor know. My supervisor has always been good to me.	Wow, what happened?
Man there aren't many people I would give my last couple hundred dollars to, with one notable exception.	Ahhh, I know what you mean. What was the exception?
My buddy Stefan. He used it to print hundreds of bootleg concert posters. We sold them and netted $2000 a piece!	I am not sure if I would do that, I'm not sure I would get caught.
I finished first in a race. I feel like gold	I am so happy for you!
Yes! It was my first victory. All my hard work is paying off	Oh that's great. What did you win?

Some of my friends told me that they had a big surprise for me. They know I hate surprises, but I complied and let the blindfold me and drive me out to the location.	That's a pretty fun surprise. Did you like it?
They had decided to pool their money together and get me one big present together. It was a flying lesson at the local airport.	Wow! That's so cool!
I found an old photo album at my grandma's house that had pictures of me when I was a kid	That is cool. I love looking back on the old photos from my childhood.
Yeah, it did. I really miss the 90s. Everything seemed a lot simpler in those days	I know what you mean.  I have a lot of fond memories of that time period.

When I was in middle school, I had a friend come over to ride horses with me. After riding my mother pressured me to get on a horse bareback I wasn't comfortable riding. She made such a big scene that I got on to make her stop.	That's so cool you were brave enough to do that.

Yes, the horse took off running and I got thrown into a metal fence. My mother then proceeded to yell and me and make fun of me for trusting her. She told me that I should never trust anyone not even my own parents, it was really embarrassing to get yelled at in from my friend. Afterwards my ribs hurt for 2 months.	That's really rough. I'm sorry you had to go through that.

My friend really wanted me to go rollerblading with him, but I haven't been rollerblading since I was a little kid. I didn't want to roll into a car.	I am sure he wouldn't have expected you to be afraid of it.
We went, but it was still pretty terrible because I felt completely uncomfortable and was bent over the whole time ready to catch myself.	That's awful.  Did you go to the bathroom?
My husband is on the road a lot, I hardley ever see him.	That can be tough, but I'm sure you're okay with it.

Yes, its hard but I try to remember he does it for our family! I have been trying to adapt to enjoying alone time.	I understand, sometimes it can be hard to let go of the people that are important to us.
I have an interview for a job that I don't feel qualified for	What kind of job is it?
I will try. I'm a pretty anxious person in general so it's hard	Why are you anxious?
I'm moving in a few months to a new state, I'm starting to feel nervous.	That is a big change.  Do you have any plans to meet new people?
To my husband hometown so it'll be new for me but he is excited to be back near family.	That's nice.  What city is he going back to?
I saw a dog get hit by car today on the highway.	Did you see what happened to the dog?
It was pretty tramatic, I still see the dog getting hit in my head and the sound. No, I was on my way to work, I couldn't stop :(	I'm sorry to hear that. I hope you're okay
I can't even begin to tell you how nervous I was about my first tattoo.	What kind of tattoo did you get?
Definitely! I get lightheaded when I see my own blood, and my pain threshold was low at the time. It turned out great though, and now I have several!	That's great!  What kind of blood?
I love my husband! He has been so sweet this week!	That's good to hear. What have you guys been doing together?
He knew I had a rough day today so he brought home my favourite wine and Taco Bell! It's the little things :)	That's really sweet of him. Did you enjoy it?
It's been a great week!	Oh yeah? What happened?
I got a promotion at work that I wasn't expecting!	That's great.  What a surprise!

Music is a powerful thing. Sometimes it feels like it can transport you to another time and place. You know what I mean?	I know exactly what you mean.  I love that feeling.  Music is my favorite thing to listen to.
Who can deny it? My dad passed away 2 years ago. Sometimes I put on his old records and imagine what it would have been like to hang out with him in the 70s.	That is sad. Do you have a favorite song?

I was feeling kind of down so I ended up snuggling with a stuffed rabbit I have. It brought back a lot of good old memories.	That is a good way to cope with sadness.  I do not have a stuffed rabbit.  I am an adult and do not have a pet.

Awe yeah thanks. He's pretty soft even though he some derpy eye that point in opposite directions. Brings me a lot of comfort and reminds me that someone cares.	That's really nice of him.  I'm glad he is so considerate.  What a nice guy.
My dog got hit by a car.	oh my god! how did he do?
He did not live. I've never felt so sad before.	What happened?
Some random guy was in my backyard, I didn't realize before I looked outside that I was missing pants.	I would be so mad!
Turns out he was the cable guy fixing a wire. Still mad he didn't ask permisson first.	Did he yell at you?
My family is still hasn't recovered from the untimely passing of my father two years ago.	That's so sad. I'm sorry to hear that.
My siblings and I are managing, and have found some peace. My mother is a different story. It was just so sudden and unexpected.	What happened?
I've got a week off from work. Time to sleep in and binge watch my favorite shows.	That sounds like a great time. What shows are you going to watch?
I like It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia. I'm rewatching it for the third time	I have never seen that show. Is it good?
I was really stressed out and grad school and had no choice but to drop out to keep my sanity.	Oh no. What was the reason?

That is what I was thinking at the time, but I've been having a really tough time finding a job where I can advance into a higher position. I always seem to get positions with no mobility.	That is a tough spot to be in.  Have you considered looking at some of the job markets in other states?
I tripped on some steps in front of a whole bunch of people on my way to class.	Oh man, that's a bummer! I'm sure they were shocked.
It was pretty humiliating. I fell flat on my face.	That's terrible. Did you hurt yourself?
My boyfriend is sick. He can't eat much so I made some soup for him	I hope he feels better soon! I'm sorry you have to do that for him.
I made chicken noodle soup.	That sounds like a good idea.
I had a meeting last week where I gave a presentation over the wrong documentation and no one said anything until after the meeting.	Oh, that sounds like a disaster. Did you have to redo it?

After I figured out what I did, I sure was. Ate at my cube ever since I don't even want to make eye contact with anyone.	That must have been very difficult for you.  I hope you are able to get through this.
I have a really big meeting next week. I have rehearsed what I am to go over all this past week and plan to practice a little more this weekend.	That's great. What is the meeting about?
It's a meeting presenting a new product to the board. Big stuff and big money for the company.	That sounds exciting! Do you think you'll get the job?
I caught my boyfriend texting his ex	Oh no! What did you do?
It was definitely a bit flirty. I think he misses being with her	That's a good thing. If they're not together, then why would you want to be with them?
I know I broke up with my ex, but I can't help but feel irritated when he talks about going on dates.	I know how that is, it's hard to be around people who just want to make you feel bad.

We actually get along really well and are much better friends than a couple. I guess I still just get a littler territorial, i think he does too.	I bet you two get along really well. It's good that you have a good friendship.
I can't wait to see my final grades. I think I got all A's this semester.	Oh wow! That's awesome!
On Monday. I'm going to treat myself if I did well	That's nice. What are you going to do?
I was very upset when I found my kitten today.	How did you find him?
No, I had to put it down. It ate a poisonous plant. He should not have been outside.	I am sorry to hear that.  What did you do?
I cried a bit, but kept it together for my little girl because she had let him out.	I enjoy visiting the nursing home on occasion.	That's very kind of you. How old are they?
Not really, I take my daughter to see them, so many of them have no visitors at all.	What are they doing?
She likes to bake, so we take them what she makes :)	I love baking.  What's her favorite recipe?
She is pretty good for an eleven year old, better than I was.	That's a great kid. What's her name?

I had a secret and went to my mother to confide in her, as well as get off my chest. I know she would never betray my secret and can always count on her.	That's good.  I'm glad you have a good relationship with your mother.
Yes, I sure do! There aren't many people you can feel that way with and I am so grateful!	I feel the same way!
My son applied to a prestigious college and the wait killed us. I was anxious and nervous waiting to see if he was accepted!	Wow! I'm sure it was a great experience!
He did! He's in his 3rd year, going to be an Aerospace Engineer, so we are very proud of him.	Oh that's awesome! What field of engineering is he studying?

My sister passed away several years ago. She took her life, and my mother and I found her right after she did it. This was very painful, traumatic and hard for us all.	That is very sad.  Do you have any children?

It didn't really seem to sink in for my mother for awhile, she was in denial. But, it was so hard when it did. I went into a depression for awhile, as she was my only sibling and we were very close.	I am sorry to hear that. It must have been very hard for you to deal with that.
When my son first started college, I felt so much love and affection, but it was definitely hard to see him go! I was very proud though.	That's so sweet.  What was he studying?

He went to the University of Alabama in Huntsville. It's focused on science, engineering, etc. He's going to be an Aerospace Engineer. It's great to see him go for his dreams!	I am so happy for him. It's always great when someone achieves their dreams!
We went on vacation a few weeks ago and went to the beach, It was so relaxing and great. I really enjoyed the time with my family.	That sounds really relaxing! What did you do?
That's great! I'm sure you earned it, just like we do. It's so good to get some time away from the hustle and bustle of life!	I am happy for you. You deserve it!
I am looking forward to next week! My husband has been out of town on business for several weeks and comes home next weekend!	That is great news!  You must be excited!
I am going to cook a special meal and see if he wants to go out, just us two. I know he will like that.	That sounds great!  I bet he'll be excited.  What kind of meal are you planning?

My husband has been out of town a few weeks for work but is coming back next weekend. I have a surprise night planned for just us. I am optimistic and sure he will really enjoy it.	That's great.  I hope you both have a good time.
Thanks! We've been married almost 23 years but I try to keep things fun and spend time together.	That's great.  I have been married for 20 years and I still try to keep things fun.

My son went back to college recently and it had me feeling a bit nostalgic. I could just picture him starting Kindergarten and it seemed not so long ago!	I bet.  I hope you are able to make more memories with him in the future.

Yes, very. But, time sure has flown by with him growing up. I can just see his little blonde head when he was 5 and just starting school!	Yeah, it's amazing how fast time goes. It seems like just yesterday you were a little kid.

I was promoted to a Team Leader and I felt very secure I could do well at the job. I had years of experience and was ready for a leadership role.	That is very impressive. You must be very confident and experienced.
Yes, thank you! I had worked very hard through the years, and I felt that I earned it, and would do well at it.	What do you do?
There was an incident where one of my back neighbors called my young son a name and made fun of him. I was so mad, beyond angry!	Wow that is horrible. I would be very angry. Did you tell him?

Yes, and she had two children of her own, similar in age. Her son also weighed more than mine! She did it because my son rode his bike through the corner of her yard as rode around the circle, that made her mad! Can you believe that??	That sounds like a crazy mom!  I can imagine she was mad.
Last week my granddaughter started school for the first time. I worried about her the entire day.	That must have been stressful. Is she doing well?
It turns out she loves and and I was a mess for 8 hours for nothing.	That's awful, how did that happen?

I always try and plan everything in advance to bring everything we need when we go on vacation. We recently went on our honeymoon and I didn't do very well this time. Ugh!	That's too bad.  Did you forget something?
I forgot everything. I guess I was so excited about the wedding, I totally failed at packing this time. Oh well, it was still fun.	I bet!  You're going to have a good time!

One day I was visiting a friend and her boyfriend came up and kissed me, while I was waiting for my friend to return from another room! It was sneaky and repulsed me!	I would be very embarrassed. I hope you can forgive him!

I didn't....only because of her situation. She had custody of her very ill and handicapped infant grandson, she wasn't working so depended on him financially and she was very much in love with him. She already suspected he was with other women, and stayed.....	It is hard when you are in love with someone, and they are not with you.
The other night I was home alone and all of a sudden I heard someone knocking at the door really loud and they wouldn't stop. I was so scared.	Oh my god, what did you do?

No, I ignored them and they finally went away. I was just about to call the police before they left though. I hope that doesn't happen again.	That's a good thing you did. It is always better to be safe than sorry.
I was trying to ignore the fact that my 50th birthday was coming up but my family decided to throw me a surprise party.	That is nice.  I hope you had fun!

It was so much fun and such a happy night. I'm trying to embrace my age now and not ignore it any more	That's a great attitude to have, especially with all the things that are coming your way as you get older.

A few weeks ago, my husband and I had a big argument. I said some pretty hurtful things, and wished I hadn't. I felt very bad and disappointed in myself afterwards.	That's so sad. I hope you guys can work through it.
Yes, that's true. I tend to be a bit more verbal on my end and say things I regret later.	That's true. I'm a bit more silent.
One night when my kids and I came home, I saw a shadow in my hallway as I came in the back door. I was so scared and was afraid someone had broken in my home.	Oh no! What did you do?

Yes, and I live out in the country so I wouldn't get a quick response time from emergency vehicles. But, luckily, it turned out to be my shadow!	That's great!  I'm glad it was your shadow and not something worse.

There was a day that I was a bit short on cash on hand and I didn't give money to a homeless man. I usually always do, as I feel it's my part to help those in need, as I am blessed. I felt very bad that I didn't that day.	That is so sad.  How did it affect you?
Well, homeless people aren't common in my area, so that's why I felt a bit bad about it.	I can understand that. I know some people who live on the streets.
When my children were born, it was a rejoicing time for me. I can't think of a time I felt more happiness.	That is awesome, congratulations!
Yes, I have two children and I feel so blessed to have them. I lucked out and got a boy and girl, both healthy, smart and wonderful.	I am happy for you! How old are they?

I used to work in a place where all my colleagues had different believes to myself. I wanted to stay true to what I believed in, so had to walk away from conversations on many occasions.	I'm sorry to hear that, you had to make a choice to stay true to yourself, I would've done the same

Just that all people should be given an equal chance in life and that no one type of person is better than another, just because of their religion or skin color, or where they come from.	I agree, but it's hard to make that happen. People are hard to change, and it's hard to get them to believe.

They believed that people of their religion where better than everyone else and were going to heaven, while the rest of us are left at the gate! That's one of their beliefs anyway. I don't agree with that, but chose to keep my mouth shut!	I recently bought a new car after not driving for several years and I was really scared to drive it, especially on the highway.	That must have been quite intimidating.  How did you feel when you got it?
Just a Honda Civic. People drive crazy around here. I don't want to have another car accident like the last one.	Oh no! Are you safe?

I recently joined a group to help me lose weight. I have so much respect and admire everyone in that group so much.	That's awesome! I've always wanted to join a weight loss group. I'm not sure if I'm up for it but I think it could be a great way to get motivated!
It has really helped to have their support. I am so grateful for them	I'm glad they are there for you.
A few years ago I applied for US citizenship. To succeed you have to pass a Civics test. I was so terribly nervous!	I would be too. I have never been so nervous in my life.
I passed! Turns out you only had to answer three questions correctly. But they have 50 to choose from so you have to study the lot!	I am happy for you. I am going to study for my last exam.

Thank you. My poor husband had to sit every single night and test me. He's American and he didn't think he could pass!	I found some old Christmas cards the other day and had a lovely time reading them and reminiscing about the people who sent them.	That's great. What kind of cards did you find?
It was so nice. I'm terrible about throwing cards out. I feel, if someone's taken the time to write, I should preserve it. Does that sound silly?	I think it's a little silly, but it's a good point.

That's very true. My Dad kept everything too. When he passed we had quite a task sorting through things. I think my brother's still at it!	I bet. I have a lot of old stuff that I never had time to sort through.
I believe you are right! My family are going to go nuts when they see what they've got to deal with, lol.	Oh yea? What is it?
When I was entering the store it was really slippery.	That must have been scary! I bet you were worried about falling.
It had been raining , so I ran across the parking lot in to the store. I slid about 3 feet.	That is hilarious! I hope you weren't hurt!
I was fine, just felt like every one was looking at me.	I am feeling a bit guilty about keeping a secret for my friend.	Oh no, what is it?
I don't want to out her to her husband, usually the only thing that happens is they drop the friend.	I don't understand why people are so afraid of the law.

Thanks, I am just going to avoid them until it plays iteself out.	I feel kind of blue today, they announced the parts for the annual play.	I know what you mean! I'm so sorry to hear that. Did they give you a part?
I did, and it is a good one, just not the one that I wanted. I didn't want the lead or anything.	Oh, I hope you get another one that you like.

It is, my friend got it, or I wouldn't think about it so much. Thanks for the kind words though.	I'm teaching my daughter how to drive, and so far, so good!	That's great, it's always fun to teach a kid to drive.

She is!  At first, though, she was very nervous.  I told her we could start off slow - her dad lives 1 mile from me down a quiet road, so we started driving back and forth between the two houses.	That sounds like a fun drive.  I bet you guys had a good time.

Hopefully by the first of the year.  We've worked up to driving to the dollar store 5 miles away.  She's still a little nervous but she's getting better and more confident the more we practice.	I bet it'll be a lot easier than you think!
I do what I can where I can.  Can't wait for our hard work to pay off and she gets her license!	That's so great.  I hope she has a good time!
My house is a mess and I've got people coming over later on this evening.	That's no fun at all! I hope you guys have fun.
I'm going to try to.  If worst comes to worse, I'll just toss everything in my back bedroom, shiny up the floors and hope for the best!  *chuckle*	Ahh, you are a very optimistic person! I like that!

My brother and I recently had to sell a house and he dealt with everything. I'm so lucky to have a brother I can rely on and who I know won't try and con me.	I would be very happy to have a brother who is honest and reliable.

We did and he was so precise with who got what and made sure he sent me my share quickly. He's such a neat brother in so many regards. I always know he'll be there for anyone who needs help.	That's great! I'm glad he's a good brother.

Don't be! There are many, many types of relationships and I don't think ours is necessarily typical. It's just the way it is :)	You are right! I am glad you are happy.

My son was in advance placement and honors during high school. He went to a prestigious college after, going for as an Aerospace Engineer. I was over here in the US when my Grandma passed in Scotland. I was so upset - nobody could get hold of me to tell me and her funeral was over before I knew about it.	that must have been so upsetting
Only for funerals, unfortunately. Both my parents have since died. Unpleasant fact of life, I'm afraid.	I'm so sorry to hear that. Do you have any plans for funerals?

Yes I was. I didn't come to the US until I was in my 30s. Didn't expect my Grandma to pass the minute I got here, but she was 96, so it shouldn't have been such a surprise!	I am happy for you. I am sure it was a nice surprise.
She was as fit as a flea too. She tripped and broke her hip and got a bad infection in the hospital. That's what she died of!	That is terrible. I am so sorry.

I am! I bought Halo and am ready to ride.	That's awesome! Halo is a great game. What are you planning to do with it?

I'm sorry to hear that, I know it's so hard to lose a parent. I think we take them for granted when we are younger, but I am blessed she's still here.	I am sorry for your loss. I think it is always hard to lose someone you love.

The live upstairs and constantly thump around, screeching into their cellphones. And then there's the video games...	I'm sorry that is such an issue. Is there a way to prevent it?

Oh I am, believe me I am. The world seems like a calm, serene place where everything is just right!	My friend from across the continent came over yesterday! I was so happy about it	Wow! That is amazing. You must have had some good time.

You're right. She's a very forgiving person and I've never forgotten before. It's on St. Paddy's day for heavens sake - how could I forget???	I was the only one wearing pajamas at this party, not my greatest moment	I am sure it was a good moment though.

around 9 months, been pretty slow to make progress but overall it's been solid	That's great. How old are you?

Seeing people taken advantage of by fake religious services is something I find the most vile. Exactly, I feel that getting people to believe irrational things is the same as giving them a brain virus, it'll slowly erode their ability to think rationally.	I agree, people are getting more and more gullible.
